title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in Amorsolo West, Makati City
description:
Amorsolo West Tower, Makati City

Overview of the Project
Amorsolo West Tower is part of the exclusive Amorsolo Square residential complex within Rockwell Center, Makati. Rising 18 stories, it is one of the more intimate residential towers in the area, designed for those who prefer a private and low-density living environment. With its prime location beside Amorsolo East and just a short walk to Power Plant Mall, Amorsolo West provides both privacy and convenience, perfectly suited for families, professionals, and expatriates.

Key Building Features

Architectural Design: Modern, low-density residential tower designed with timeless finishes and spacious layouts.

Unit Configurations: One-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom units ranging from approx. 70 sqm to 220 sqm.

Premium Finishes: Units with large windows, engineered wood floors, modular kitchens, and high-quality bathroom fixtures.

Safety & Convenience: 24/7 security, CCTV monitoring, high-speed elevators, 100% backup power, and secure parking levels.

Facilities & Services

Outdoor Amenities:

Swimming pool with landscaped deck

Children’s play area

Garden lounges

Indoor Amenities:

Fitness gym

Function and meeting rooms

Lobby with concierge and reception services

Services:

24-hour security and building maintenance

Ample parking spaces

Property management office

Nearby Establishments

Shopping & Dining:

Power Plant Mall – luxury shopping and dining within Rockwell Center

Rockwell Retail Row – home to cafés, restaurants, and boutique stores

Century City Mall – lifestyle and entertainment hub nearby

Educational Institutions:

Ateneo Professional Schools – Rockwell

Assumption College

Colegio de San Agustin – Makati

Healthcare Facilities:

Makati Medical Center

Unciano General Hospital

Pacific Eye Laser Center

Business Hubs:

Rockwell Business Center

Makati Central Business District

Bonifacio Global City (15–20 minutes)

Ortigas Center (20–25 minutes via EDSA)

Transportation & Accessibility

Road Access: Easily connected via J.P. Rizal, Estrella, and Rockwell Drive, with quick access to EDSA, Makati Avenue, and Kalayaan Avenue.

Public Transport: Close to MRT Guadalupe Station; jeepney, bus, and UV Express routes available along EDSA and J.P. Rizal.

Shuttle & P2P Services: Rockwell’s private shuttle services plus nearby P2P bus terminals at Glorietta and Greenbelt for convenient travel to Alabang, Ortigas, and NAIA.

Airport Access: About 25–35 minutes to Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) via Skyway or EDSA.

Walkability: Highly walkable within Rockwell Center, with direct pedestrian access to Power Plant Mall, dining strips, and nearby business hubs.


Property Specifications: 
Unit Type: 1 bedroom loft with 1 bathroom 
Floor area: 73sqm
Status: Semi-Furnished
Parking: 1 slots

Total Contract Price: Php 25,000,000

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in One Rockwell West Tower, Makati City
description:
One Rockwell West Tower, Makati City

Overview of the Project
One Rockwell West Tower is a 55-story residential skyscraper located in the prestigious Rockwell Center, Makati. Known for its iconic Z-shaped units and innovative architectural design, the West Tower stands as one of the most recognizable residential developments in the city. With sweeping views of Makati, Ortigas, and Bonifacio Global City, it offers urban sophistication and exclusivity while maintaining proximity to top business hubs, shopping destinations, and lifestyle centers.

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Designed by Arquitectonica, the West Tower features innovative layouts such as the Z-Loft units with floor-to-ceiling glass walls, maximizing natural light and city views.

Unit Configurations: Studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom units ranging from approx. 42 sqm to over 170 sqm.

Premium Finishes: Units feature engineered wood flooring, modular kitchens, high-end fixtures, and provisions for split-type air-conditioning.

Safety & Convenience: Equipped with 24/7 security, CCTV, multiple high-speed elevators, electronic access cards, and 100% backup power.

Facilities & Services
Outdoor Amenities:
Swimming pools for adults and children
Landscaped gardens and open spaces
Deck and lounge areas for relaxation

Indoor Amenities:
Fully equipped fitness center
Multi-purpose function rooms
Retail establishments and dining outlets at the ground levels
Lobby with concierge and reception services

Services:
24-hour security and building maintenance
Ample parking facilities
Property management office
Nearby Establishments

Shopping & Dining:
Power Plant Mall – directly within Rockwell Center
Rockwell Retail Rows – luxury boutiques and fine dining
Century City Mall – nearby lifestyle hub

Educational Institutions:
Ateneo Professional Schools – Rockwell
Assumption College
Colegio de San Agustin – Makati

Healthcare Facilities:
Makati Medical Center
Unciano General Hospital
Pacific Eye Laser Center

Business Hubs:
Makati Central Business District
Rockwell Business Center
Bonifacio Global City
Ortigas Center (via EDSA)

Transportation & Accessibility
Road Access: Strategically located near Estrella and J.P. Rizal, with direct links to EDSA, Makati Avenue, and Kalayaan Avenue for easy access to Ortigas and BGC.

Public Transport: Close to MRT Guadalupe Station; jeepney and bus routes available along EDSA and J.P. Rizal.

Shuttle & P2P Services: Rockwell’s in-house shuttle system plus nearby P2P bus terminals at Glorietta and Greenbelt for direct connections to Ortigas, Alabang, and NAIA.

Airport Access: Approximately 25–35 minutes to Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA) via EDSA or Skyway.

Walkability: Highly pedestrian-friendly; residents can walk to Power Plant Mall, dining strips, and Rockwell Business Center.

description:
The Knightsbridge Residences, Makati City

Overview of the Project
The Knightsbridge Residences is a landmark residential skyscraper in Century City, Makati. Rising 64 stories high, it is one of the tallest buildings in the Philippines, developed by Century Properties. Inspired by London’s prestigious Knightsbridge district, the tower combines world-class design with hotel-inspired living. Located along Kalayaan Avenue, it provides residents quick access to Makati’s Central Business District, Rockwell Center, and Bonifacio Global City, while being just steps away from Century City Mall’s shopping, dining, and entertainment options.

description:
The Manansala Tower, Makati City

Overview of the Project
The Manansala Tower is a premier residential high-rise located in the exclusive Rockwell Center, Makati. Rising 41 stories high, it offers a perfect balance of urban sophistication and comfort, designed for professionals, families, and expatriates who value both convenience and security. With its direct connection to Power Plant Mall and proximity to Makati CBD, Ortigas, and Bonifacio Global City, The Manansala remains one of the most desirable addresses in Metro Manila.

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Sleek, contemporary tower with floor-to-ceiling windows and warm modern finishes.

Unit Configurations: Spacious one-, two-, and three-bedroom units (approx. 70 sqm to 150+ sqm).

Premium Finishes: Granite countertops, engineered wood flooring, built-in cabinetry, and provisions for air-conditioning and modern appliances.

Safety & Convenience: 24/7 security, CCTV, high-speed elevators, 100% backup power, and keycard-controlled access.

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in One Rockwell  East, Makati City
description:
One Rockwell – East Tower

Overview of the Project
Rising within the prestigious Rockwell Center in Makati City, One Rockwell East Tower offers contemporary urban living with the distinct sophistication of Rockwell Land. Known for its innovative Z-shaped layout, this 45-story residential tower provides residents with bright, airy spaces and panoramic views of the Makati skyline, Rockwell Center, and the surrounding cityscape. Conveniently connected to Power Plant Mall via an elevated walkway, it offers direct access to high-end retail, dining, and entertainment, while being minutes away from the Makati CBD, Bonifacio Global City, and Ortigas.

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Designed by Arquitectonica, the East Tower features sleek glass façades, efficient floor layouts, and Rockwell’s signature contemporary aesthetic.

Unit Configurations: Offers studio, one-, two-, and three-bedroom units ranging from approximately 39 sqm to 128 sqm, with select loft-type layouts for added space and style.

Premium Finishes: Units are fitted with engineered wood flooring, natural stone countertops, built-in cabinetry, and provisions for air-conditioning and modern appliances.

Safety and Convenience: High-speed elevators, 100% backup power, 24/7 security with CCTV monitoring, and controlled-access lobbies ensure comfort and peace of mind.

Facilities & Services
Outdoor Amenities:
Swimming pool with landscaped deck
Kiddie pool
Landscaped gardens and open-air lounge areas

Fully equipped fitness center
Function rooms and meeting spaces
Elegant lobby with concierge services

Rising within the prestigious Rockwell Center in Makati City, One Rockwell East Tower offers contemporary urban living with the distinct sophistication of Rockwell Land. Known for its innovative Z-shaped layout, this 45-story residential tower provides residents with bright, airy spaces and panoramic views of the Makati skyline, Rockwell Center, and the surrounding cityscape. Conveniently connected to Power Plant Mall via an elevated walkway, it offers direct access to high-end retail, dining, and entertainment, while being minutes away from the Makati CBD, Bonifacio Global City, and Ortigas.

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in One Rockwell East, Makati City
description:
One Rockwell East

Overview of the Project:

One Rockwell East Tower is a 45-story residential condominium located in Rockwell Center, Makati City, Philippines. Completed in 2011, it is part of the One Rockwell complex developed by Rockwell Land Corporation. The tower is notable for its innovative architectural design, including Z-shaped units that provide residents with expansive views of the city. 

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Designed by Arquitectonica, the tower features a unique structure that appears as three separate buildings. The design was inspired by the Banaue Rice Terraces, incorporating double-height floor-to-ceiling glass panels to maximize natural light and views. 

Unit Configurations: The East Tower offers a variety of unit types, including one- to three-bedroom units and loft-style residences. The Z-shaped units are a signature feature, providing dual views and enhanced privacy.

Modern Finishes: Units are equipped with high-quality materials and finishes, ensuring a blend of style and functionality.

Facilities & Services
-Swimming Pools: Two outdoor swimming pools and a kiddie pool provide leisure options for residents. 
-Fitness Center: A two-story private gym club is available for residents' fitness needs. 
-Children's Playground: An outdoor play area is designed for children's recreation. 
-Sky Deck: Located on the 41st floor, the sky deck offers panoramic views of the city. 
-Function Rooms: Function rooms on the third floor are available for events and gatherings. 
-Security and Services: The building provides 24-hour security, concierge services, and secure parking facilities.

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale In Knightsbridge, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project
A premium residential tower situated at the intersection of Salamanca Street and Kalayaan Avenue in Makati’s Century City development.Located just a few blocks from the Makati Central Business District, dining, shopping, and entertainment hubs, the building enjoys both prestige and convenience. It's approximately a 30‑minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Designed by ASYA Design Partners in collaboration with the Jerde Partnership International (for master planning), and engineered by Aromin & Sy + Associates, the building features the striking "Lantern" concept—stacked glass‑box units with floor‑to‑ceiling windows that glow at nigh


Key Building Features
The tower rises to approximately 210 m with 60 aboveground floors and 4 belowground levels (some sources note minor discrepancies up to 62 above‑ground plus 5 sub‑levels).Designed as a high-end condominium, the units span a variety of floor plans and sizes. Though specific unit mix data is limited, the building’s layout and high ceiling heights speak to residential comfort and luxury appeal. The design inspiration reflects the upscale London neighborhood of Knightsbridge, signaling sophistication and elegance
.The Knightsbridge Residences delivers a harmonious blend of architectural distinction, luxurious amenities, and a premium location. From glowing glass facades to high‑ceilings and resort‑inspired facilities, the project exemplifies upscale residential urbanism in Metro Manila. Its proximity to commercial corridors, cultural nodes, and transport access makes it both a lifestyle statement and a smart investment.

Facilities & Services
24/7 security and CCTV surveillance
Concierge and front desk services
Property management office

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in One Rockwell East, Makati City
description:
One Rockwell East

Overview of the Project:

One Rockwell East Tower is a 45-story residential condominium located in Rockwell Center, Makati City, Philippines. Completed in 2011, it is part of the One Rockwell complex developed by Rockwell Land Corporation. The tower is notable for its innovative architectural design, including Z-shaped units that provide residents with expansive views of the city. 

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Designed by Arquitectonica, the tower features a unique structure that appears as three separate buildings. The design was inspired by the Banaue Rice Terraces, incorporating double-height floor-to-ceiling glass panels to maximize natural light and views. 

Unit Configurations: The East Tower offers a variety of unit types, including one- to three-bedroom units and loft-style residences. The Z-shaped units are a signature feature, providing dual views and enhanced privacy.

Modern Finishes: Units are equipped with high-quality materials and finishes, ensuring a blend of style and functionality.

Facilities & Services
-Swimming Pools: Two outdoor swimming pools and a kiddie pool provide leisure options for residents. 
-Fitness Center: A two-story private gym club is available for residents' fitness needs. 
-Children's Playground: An outdoor play area is designed for children's recreation. 
-Sky Deck: Located on the 41st floor, the sky deck offers panoramic views of the city. 
-Function Rooms: Function rooms on the third floor are available for events and gatherings. 
-Security and Services: The building provides 24-hour security, concierge services, and secure parking facilities. 

Nearby Establishments
Shopping & Dining:
-Power Plant Mall: An upscale shopping mall offering a mix of international brands, dining options, and entertainment facilities.
-Rockwell Retail Rows: Features a variety of retail shops and restaurants within walking distance.

Educational Institutions:
-Ateneo Professional Schools: Located nearby, offering graduate programs in business and law.

Healthcare Facilities:
-Healthway Medical: A medical clinic providing various health services.

Parks and Recreation:
-Ayala Triangle Gardens: A 2-hectare urban park offering green spaces and public art installations.

* Colegio San Agustin Makati – 10 mins drive
* Ateneo Graduate School of Business / Rockwell Campus – 15 mins
* De La Salle University – Taft – ~20 mins via MRT or car

Business & Commercial Centers
* Ayala Center Makati (includes Glorietta, Greenbelt, SM Makati) – 10 mins
* Makati Central Business District (CBD) – 5–10 mins drive
* Legazpi and Salcedo Business Villages – 10 mins
* Bonifacio Global City (BGC) – 20 mins via EDSA or C5
* Ortigas CBD – 25 mins via MRT
* RCBC Plaza & PBCom Tower – 12 mins
* Near NAIA terminals (20–30 mins)

Malls and Retail Access
* San Lorenzo Place Mall – within the property (3-storey)
* Alphaland Southgate Mall – connected via elevated walkway
* SM Makati / Glorietta / Landmark / Greenbelt – short MRT or drive away
* Waltermart Makati – 5 mins

Nearby Hospitals
* Makati Medical Center – 8 mins drive
* St. Luke’s Medical Center – BGC – 20 mins drive
* Adventist Medical Center Manila – 15 mins via EDSA
* Ospital ng Makati – 15 mins
* Mandaluyong City Medical Center – 20 mins

Amenities & Facilities
* Commercial shops at ground and podium levels
* 20- meters lap pool, wading pool, children’s water play area, Jacuzzi and paved sunbathing deck
* Changing rooms and outdoors shower area 
* Laundromat 
* Day care center
* Fitness gym 
* Outdoor fitness station
* Basketball court (convertible to tennis court)
* Pocket gardens & landscaped deck areas
* Jogging trails & paved sunbathing deck
* Children’s playground
* Function/business centers
* Residential parking
* Integrated three‑level retail place (San Lorenzo Place Mall)

San Lorenzo Place is connected directly to Magallanes MRT Station, with covered walkways that also link to nearby landmarks like Alphaland Southgate Mall.

description:
🌟 Eluria Makati – Own the Rarest Jewel in the City 🌟

Some addresses speak of convenience. Others of prestige. Eluria speaks of both—wrapped in elegance, sustainability, and exclusivity.

In the heart of Legazpi Village, Makati, only a select few will ever call this home. Imagine stepping out of your private lift lobby into a 3-bedroom sanctuary spanning 294 sqm (~3,165 sq ft), with three parking slots reserved only for you.

Every detail whispers luxury:

✨ Sunlight pouring through floor-to-ceiling windows
✨ Expansive living spaces for intimate gatherings or grand celebrations
✨ A master suite that feels like a 5-star retreat
✨ A gourmet kitchen crafted for both function and style

Beyond your doors, world-class indulgences await—
🏊 Heated saltwater pool for serene mornings
🌿 Rooftop Potager Garden with panoramic skyline views
🛎 White-glove butler service to cater to your every need

Built with the future in mind, Eluria is LEED Gold pre-certified and designed for healthier living—low-emission materials, advanced air purification, and energy-efficient systems protect both you and your investment.

Why invest?

Because in a city that’s always growing, true scarcity is what holds the greatest value. With only limited residences, this isn’t just a property—it’s a legacy asset. One that offers unmatched lifestyle today and long-term appreciation tomorrow.

📍 Steps from Greenbelt, Ayala Triangle, and Makati’s cultural and culinary icons.

📞 Claim Your Legacy
Secure one of Makati’s most coveted addresses. Contact us today for a private tour and investment details.

title: Grand Soho Makati Spacious Studio with Balcony Bel-air Village View Rush For Sale!
description:
Live in the Heart of Makati! Furnished Studio at Grand Soho Makati - Only ₱5,900,000!

The Property

Step into this exceptional, fully furnished studio unit at the prestigious Grand Soho Makati. This 29.42 sqm condo is a masterpiece of urban living, featuring a private balcony that offers a serene and breathtaking view of the exclusive Bel-Air Village. Priced to sell immediately at just ₱5,900,000.00, this is a rare opportunity to own a prime piece of real estate in one of the country's most coveted addresses.

Grand Soho Makati: A Class Above
Grand Soho Makati is not just a building; it's a lifestyle destination. This architectural gem offers a range of top-notch amenities and features designed for the modern urban dweller.

	•	Hotel-Like Living: Enjoy the luxury of hotel-style amenities, including a magnificent grand lobby with a 24-hour concierge and security service.

	•	Recreation and Wellness: Indulge in a variety of recreational facilities, such as the state-of-the-art fitness gym, swimming pool, and a function room perfect for social gatherings.

	•	Convenience at Your Doorstep: The building also provides an on-site commercial area, ensuring that daily necessities are always within reach.
Prime Location & Neighborhood
Strategically situated at the heart of Makati's Central Business District, Grand Soho Makati places you right in the middle of all the action.

	•	Vibrant & Dynamic: The building is located along H.V. Dela Costa Street, a prime location that connects you to major thoroughfares and pedestrian walkways. This means you can walk to work, restaurants, and other establishments without the hassle of traffic.

	•	Safety & Security: Living in this area means being part of a well-maintained and secure community. The stunning view of the lush and private Bel-Air Village from your balcony is a testament to the exclusivity and tranquility that the neighborhood offers.
Benefits of Having a Home in this Area

	•	Central Business District Access: Say goodbye to long commutes! The condo is within walking distance of major office buildings, multinational corporations, and co-working spaces, making it an ideal home for professionals and entrepreneurs.

	•	Unrivaled Lifestyle: You are surrounded by a world-class selection of fine dining restaurants, trendy cafes, vibrant bars, and upscale shopping centers. Salcedo Saturday Market and Ayala Triangle Gardens are also just a few blocks away, providing a perfect spot for relaxation and recreation.

	•	Excellent Investment Potential: Properties in Makati's CBD are known for their high appreciation rate and strong rental demand. This unit, with its prime location and luxury features, is guaranteed to be a solid investment, whether you're a first-time homebuyer or a seasoned investor.

This is your chance to own a piece of the vibrant Makati lifestyle. Don't let this opportunity slip away. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and make this beautiful unit yours!

title: 1 Bedroom For Sale in Air Residences, Makati City
description:
Project Overview:
Air Residences is an elegant residential condominium development by SMDC, located in the heart of Makati City. Designed to offer a harmonious blend of modern living and resort-style amenities, Air Residences promises a sophisticated lifestyle amid the vibrant energy of Metro Manila’s central business district. This striking tower boasts convenient access to the city’s prime shopping, dining, and entertainment hubs, while offering residents a peaceful sanctuary with expansive green spaces and world-class amenities. With its strategic location and upscale design, Air Residences is a true symbol of modern luxury living in Makati.

Key Building Features:
Air Residences is defined by its sleek, contemporary architecture, complemented by spacious balconies that offer spectacular views of Makati's skyline and beyond. The building features a grand, welcoming lobby, high-speed elevators, and an advanced security system, ensuring both comfort and safety for its residents. The development provides access to a range of premium amenities, including beautifully landscaped gardens, a resort-style swimming pool, and a fully-equipped fitness center. The tower’s design is tailored to deliver an elevated living experience, combining luxury with practicality.

Unit Configurations:
Air Residences offers a variety of well-designed residential units, featuring open layouts with high ceilings and large windows that maximize natural light and stunning views of the city. Units are available in configurations ideal for individuals, couples, and families, ensuring comfort and functionality. Each unit comes with at least one parking slot, and additional parking spaces are available for those who require extra convenience.

Modern Finishes:
Units at Air Residences come with top-of-the-line finishes, including polished ceramic tile flooring, sleek granite countertops, and high-end bathroom fixtures. The kitchens are fully fitted with modern appliances and ample storage space, making everyday living easier and more convenient. Each unit is equipped with split-type air-conditioning systems and is smart home-ready, allowing residents to effortlessly enjoy a comfortable, tech-enabled lifestyle.

Facilities & Services:
24/7 Security & Concierge
Full Backup Power for All Units
Resort-Style Swimming Pools
Fully-Equipped Fitness Center

title: Makati Bel-air Jazz Residences Junior 1-bedroom For Sale
description:
The Perfect Makati Investment Awaits You at Jazz Residences!
Don't just buy a condo; own a piece of Makati's vibrant lifestyle and a guaranteed income stream! We are offering a rare opportunity to acquire a prime unit at Jazz Residences Tower C, a property that offers both a luxurious living experience and a smart, immediate return on investment.
Your Smart Investment: Unit Details
This is your chance to own a Junior 1-Bedroom unit with a breathtaking Makati-Manila skyline view. At a comfortable 20.32 sqm, this unit is already partly furnished, making it hassle-free for you and your tenant. Best of all, it's a tenanted property, generating a stable income of ₱17,000 per month from day one. All of this can be yours for an unbeatable price of just ₱2.9M!
This isn't just a property; it's a cash-flowing asset!
Why Jazz Residences is the Ultimate Choice
Jazz Residences isn't just a building; it's a complete lifestyle hub. As an owner, you and your tenant will have access to an impressive array of features and amenities that make it one of the most sought-after addresses in Makati:
 * Jazz Mall at your Doorstep: Enjoy unparalleled convenience with a full-service mall on the ground floor. It features a supermarket (SM Hypermarket), a wide array of restaurants, cafes, and essential services like banks and pharmacies.
 * Resort-Style Amenities: The building boasts a lavish podium with multiple swimming pools, a well-equipped gym, a children's play area, and lush gardens—a true urban oasis.
 * Top-notch Security: With a 24/7 security system, CCTV in common areas, and a front desk concierge, you can be assured of a safe and secure environment.
Location, Location, Location!
The value of this property is amplified by its strategic location. Situated at the heart of Bel-Air, you are minutes away from Makati's most vital installations:
 * Business Districts: A short commute to the Makati Central Business District, home to top corporations, embassies, and financial institutions.
 * Shopping and Entertainment: Close proximity to Ayala Malls, Greenbelt, Glorietta, and Power Plant Mall in Rockwell.
 * Healthcare: Reputable hospitals like Makati Medical Center are just a stone's throw away.
 * Education: Some of the country's top universities and colleges are easily accessible.
The Advantage of Owning a Tenanted Property
This is a rare opportunity for savvy investors. By purchasing this unit, you are:
 * Gaining Immediate ROI: Start earning a return on your investment from the day you own it, with a steady ₱17,000/month income.
 * Skipping the Hassle: No need to search for a tenant, screen applicants, or market the unit. The hard work is already done!
 * Investing in a High-Demand Location: Makati properties are a blue-chip investment. Demand for rentals in this area is consistently high, ensuring your investment will continue to grow in value.
Who is this Property Ideal For?
This property is perfect for a first-time real estate investor looking for a low-risk entry into the market. It's also ideal for overseas Filipino workers (OFWs) who want a tangible, income-generating asset back home, or for experienced investors looking to expand their portfolio with a hassle-free, high-yield property.
Opportunities like this are rare and disappear quickly. Act now and secure your future in one of the most dynamic cities in the Philippines!

title: ONE ROXAS TRIANGLE | 286sqm Three Bedroom 3BR Unit for Sale in One Roxas Triangle, Makati City
1 Bedroom For Sale In Greenbelt Chancellor, Makati City
description:
Project Overview
Greenbelt Chancellor is a high-rise residential condominium developed by Megaworld Corporation, located along Rada Street in Legazpi Village, Makati City. Just a few steps away from the prestigious Greenbelt lifestyle hub, this exclusive development is designed for urban professionals and executives who seek comfort, convenience, and refined city living in the heart of the Makati Central Business District.

Key Features
A prime residential tower offering secure, high-rise living with direct access to Makati’s premier shopping, dining, and business centers. Designed for comfort and exclusivity, the building features modern interiors, well-planned amenities, and efficient unit layouts—perfect for individuals and families who want to live within walking distance to everything.

Unit Configurations
Greenbelt Chancellor offers studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom units ranging from approximately 38 to 80 sqm. These units are tailored for professionals, couples, and small families looking for functional spaces within a premium location.

Premium Finishes
Units come semi-furnished with split-type air-conditioning, laminated wood flooring, built-in kitchen cabinetry with granite countertops, and modern bathroom fittings. Large windows allow for natural lighting and city views, providing a comfortable and elegant living space.

Safety and Convenience
The development offers 24/7 security, CCTV monitoring, high-speed elevators, and a fully staffed concierge. Located within a vibrant, walkable neighborhood, residents enjoy unmatched access to shopping malls, offices, parks, and essential services all within a secure and well-maintained environment.

Facilities & Services

Amenity Highlights:

Adult swimming pool

title: Studio For Sale In One Pacific Place Salcedo, Makati City
description:
One Pacific Place is a modern residential condominium located in the heart of Salcedo Village, Makati City one of the city’s most sought-after neighborhoods for urban professionals, families, and investors. Known for its serene environment, vibrant weekday market, and proximity to the Makati Central Business District, One Pacific Place offers a blend of comfort, convenience, and practical luxury. Whether you're seeking a new home or a high-value property investment, this development is a smart choice for those who appreciate quality living in a strategic location.

Key Building Features

One Pacific Place stands out with its clean, contemporary architecture and thoughtfully designed common areas. The building features high-speed elevators, 24/7 security, and a full range of lifestyle amenities that support work-life balance and modern living in the city.

Unit Configurations

Units are smartly designed with functional layouts that maximize space efficiency. Select units offer expansive windows with views of the Makati skyline or the tranquil greenery of Salcedo Park.

Modern Finishes

title: The Oriental Place Makati with Free Pool and Gym Access
description:
Welcome to direct owner’s unit  at  THE ORIENTAL PLACE MAKATI,  1 bedroom  with 27 sqm size,  queen size bed, free access of POOL and GYM   located at strategic  place of  Makati.  

·  Prime Makati Location
Situated along Don Chino Roces Avenue, The Oriental Place puts you at the heart of Makati—just minutes away from Ayala Avenue, Legaspi Village, and Greenbelt.

·  Affordable Luxury in the CBD
Compared to other Makati condos, it offers more competitive rental rates while still delivering modern amenities and a central address.

·  Walking Distance to Malls & Dining Hubs
Close to Greenbelt, Glorietta, The Landmark, and countless dining options, giving you unlimited lifestyle choices right at your doorstep.

·  Modern Resort-Inspired Amenities
Enjoy a swimming pool, gym, function rooms, landscaped areas, and kid-friendly spaces—ideal for relaxation and work-life balance.

·  Safe and Secure Living
With 24/7 security, CCTV monitoring, and a reliable concierge, residents can enjoy peace of mind in a protected community.

 ·  Accessible Transportation
Easy access to EDSA, South Luzon Expressway, and key transport routes, making commutes to BGC, Ortigas, and the airport faster and more convenient.

·  Business & Professional Advantage
Located near major offices, corporate headquarters, and co-working hubs—perfect for young professionals and business executives.

·  Proximity to Schools & Universities
Ideal for families and students with schools like Don Bosco Makati, Assumption College, and Colegio San Agustin nearby.

·  Practical Unit Layouts
Designed to maximize space and comfort, units are perfect for singles, couples, or small families seeking a functional and modern home.

·  Great Value for Renters & Investors
Because of its strategic location and affordability, The Oriental Place maintains strong rental demand—ideal for those looking at long-term investment returns.

1 Bedroom For Sale In Greenbelt Chancellor, Makati City
description:
Greenbelt Chancellor, Makati City

Project Overview
Greenbelt Chancellor is a high-rise residential condominium developed by Megaworld Corporation, located along Rada Street in Legazpi Village, Makati City. Just a few steps away from the prestigious Greenbelt lifestyle hub, this exclusive development is designed for urban professionals and executives who seek comfort, convenience, and refined city living in the heart of the Makati Central Business District.

Key Features
A prime residential tower offering secure, high-rise living with direct access to Makati’s premier shopping, dining, and business centers. Designed for comfort and exclusivity, the building features modern interiors, well-planned amenities, and efficient unit layouts—perfect for individuals and families who want to live within walking distance to everything.

Unit Configurations
Greenbelt Chancellor offers studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom units ranging from approximately 38 to 80 sqm. These units are tailored for professionals, couples, and small families looking for functional spaces within a premium location.

Premium Finishes
Units come semi-furnished with split-type air-conditioning, laminated wood flooring, built-in kitchen cabinetry with granite countertops, and modern bathroom fittings. Large windows allow for natural lighting and city views, providing a comfortable and elegant living space.

Safety and Convenience
The development offers 24/7 security, CCTV monitoring, high-speed elevators, and a fully staffed concierge. Located within a vibrant, walkable neighborhood, residents enjoy unmatched access to shopping malls, offices, parks, and essential services all within a secure and well-maintained environment.

Adult swimming pool
Fully equipped fitness center

Lush Residences is a condominium in Makati that seamlessly blends elements of nature throughout the property, offering a natural escape from the concrete jungle of the city just north of the Makati Central Business district.

Location: Situated on Bagtikan St. corner Kamagong St., Makati City, just north of the Makati Central Business District. It is near various establishments including Jazz Mall, RCBC Plaza, Makati Fire Station, Far Eastern University - Makati, and Ayala Museum.

Project Overview:

Lot Area: 2,865 sq.m.
No. of Towers: 1
No. of Floors (physical): 22
No. of Units: 674
No. of Parking Slots: 181
Turnover Date: December 2022 (Estimated project completion: December 31, 2022)

Amenities: 

Features hotel-like lobbies, resort-styled amenities including a grand lobby, function rooms (Ground Floor), residential lobby (7th Floor), gym (7th Floor), adult and kiddie pools (7th Floor), porch area (7th Floor), podium garden (7th Floor), and sky garden.

Standard Unit Deliverables: 

Include floor tiles, painted plain cement finish on walls and ceiling, aluminum-framed windows, kitchen with countertop and cabinets, complete toilet and bath fixtures, provision for water heater, rangehood, and cooktop.

Condo dues: 160 per sqm

title: Studio For Sale In Milano Residences, Makati City
description:
Overview of the project 

The Milano Residences is a luxury residential condominium inspired by the world’s fashion capital, Milan. Developed by Century Properties and designed by the renowned Italian fashion house Versace Home, this iconic tower redefines upscale urban living in Makati. Nestled within the exclusive Century City enclave in Poblacion, the development offers an opulent lifestyle with access to top-tier amenities, high-end retail, and proximity to the city’s major business districts. Ideal for stylish professionals, investors, and cosmopolitan families, Milano delivers a bold blend of elegance, innovation, and convenience.

Key Building Features

The Milano Residences features striking architectural design, a fashion-forward grand lobby, and interiors infused with Versace’s signature aesthetic. The tower is equipped with high-speed elevators, top-notch security, and a full suite of luxury amenities providing residents with both privacy and prestige in one of Makati’s most vibrant neighborhoods.

Unit Configurations

Units are crafted to embody Italian sophistication with functional layouts, maximizing both style and efficiency. Select units offer panoramic city views of Makati, Century City, and beyond.

Modern Finishes

Each unit is designed with premium finishes including imported stone countertops, engineered wood or tile flooring, designer cabinetry, and sleek European-style bathrooms. From the lighting to the details, everything reflects a commitment to luxury and tasteful living.

Facilities & Services

Indoor Pool and Spa Lounge
Fully Equipped Fitness Center
Business Center
Library and Lounge
Function Room
Sky Garden with City Views
24/7 Security and CCTV Monitoring

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale In One Lafayette, Makati City
description:
Overview of the project 
One Lafayette Square is a well-established high-rise residential condominium situated in the heart of Salcedo Village, Makati Central Business District. Combining the charm of classic architecture with the convenience of modern urban living, the building offers a refined address for professionals, entrepreneurs, and families. Located just a few steps from office towers, parks, weekend markets, and renowned dining spots, One Lafayette Square provides a balanced lifestyle seamlessly blending work, leisure, and comfort in a prime location.

Key Building Features

Designed for privacy and function, One Lafayette Square features an elegant main lobby, high-speed elevators, and well-maintained common areas. Residents benefit from 24/7 security and the calming ambiance of a quieter residential zone in bustling Makati. With its ideal location and solid infrastructure, the building remains a preferred choice for long-term residents and investors alike.

Unit Configurations

Units are thoughtfully laid out to maximize usable space, ventilation, and natural light. Some residences offer relaxing views of the Salcedo greenery, Makati skyline, or the nearby parks.

Modern Finishes

Each unit is crafted with a balance of durability and style featuring ceramic or wood laminate flooring, granite kitchen countertops, ample cabinet storage, and tiled bathrooms with quality fittings. The interiors offer flexibility for modern updates while remaining fully functional for immediate occupancy.

Facilities & Services

Adult and Kiddie Swimming Pool
Fitness Gym

title: 2BR Unit for lease in The Residences at Greenbelt
description:
Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The Residences at Greenbelt – San Lorenzo Tower was the second of three buildings being constructed as part of The Residences at Greenbelt (TRAG) complex, and is the highest of the three. It was the 11th-tallest building in the country and Metro Manila at the time of construction with a height of 204.5 meters from the ground to its architectural spire. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.

Experience living a great life in Makati by renting out this unit from The Residences at Greenbelt! Head now to HousingInteractive and let us help you in having this unit!

Studio For Sale In Knightsbridge Residence, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project
A premium residential tower situated at the intersection of Salamanca Street and Kalayaan Avenue in Makati’s Century City development.Located just a few blocks from the Makati Central Business District, dining, shopping, and entertainment hubs, the building enjoys both prestige and convenience. It's approximately a 30‑minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Designed by ASYA Design Partners in collaboration with the Jerde Partnership International (for master planning), and engineered by Aromin & Sy + Associates, the building features the striking "Lantern" concept—stacked glass‑box units with floor‑to‑ceiling windows that glow at nigh


Key Building Features
The tower rises to approximately 210 m with 60 aboveground floors and 4 belowground levels (some sources note minor discrepancies up to 62 above‑ground plus 5 sub‑levels).Designed as a high-end condominium, the units span a variety of floor plans and sizes. Though specific unit mix data is limited, the building’s layout and high ceiling heights speak to residential comfort and luxury appeal. The design inspiration reflects the upscale London neighborhood of Knightsbridge, signaling sophistication and elegance
.The Knightsbridge Residences delivers a harmonious blend of architectural distinction, luxurious amenities, and a premium location. From glowing glass facades to high‑ceilings and resort‑inspired facilities, the project exemplifies upscale residential urbanism in Metro Manila. Its proximity to commercial corridors, cultural nodes, and transport access makes it both a lifestyle statement and a smart investment.

Mosaic Tower is a 28-storey premium residential condominium located in the vibrant Legazpi Village, right in the heart of Makati’s Central Business District. Completed in 2011 and developed by Vista Residences, Mosaic Tower offers elegant ready-for-occupancy units that blend contemporary design with hotel-style comfort.
Perfect for professionals, couples, and investors, Mosaic Tower provides the luxury of city living with spacious units, top-notch amenities, and proximity to premier lifestyle destinations like Greenbelt Mall and Ayala Center.

title: One Roxas Triangle, 3 Bedroom Condo for Sale in Makati City
Studio For Sale In Knightsbridge Residence, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project
A premium residential tower situated at the intersection of Salamanca Street and Kalayaan Avenue in Makati’s Century City development.Located just a few blocks from the Makati Central Business District, dining, shopping, and entertainment hubs, the building enjoys both prestige and convenience. It's approximately a 30‑minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Designed by ASYA Design Partners in collaboration with the Jerde Partnership International (for master planning), and engineered by Aromin & Sy + Associates, the building features the striking "Lantern" concept—stacked glass‑box units with floor‑to‑ceiling windows that glow at nigh


Key Building Features
The tower rises to approximately 210 m with 60 aboveground floors and 4 belowground levels (some sources note minor discrepancies up to 62 above‑ground plus 5 sub‑levels).Designed as a high-end condominium, the units span a variety of floor plans and sizes. Though specific unit mix data is limited, the building’s layout and high ceiling heights speak to residential comfort and luxury appeal. The design inspiration reflects the upscale London neighborhood of Knightsbridge, signaling sophistication and elegance
.The Knightsbridge Residences delivers a harmonious blend of architectural distinction, luxurious amenities, and a premium location. From glowing glass facades to high‑ceilings and resort‑inspired facilities, the project exemplifies upscale residential urbanism in Metro Manila. Its proximity to commercial corridors, cultural nodes, and transport access makes it both a lifestyle statement and a smart investment.

Facilities & Services
24/7 security and CCTV surveillance
Concierge and front desk services
Property management office
High-speed elevators (10 units)

title: Studio For Sale In Antel Spa, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project

Antel Spa Suites, also known as Serenity Suites, is a wellness-inspired residential condominium located along Makati Avenue corner Salamanca Street, Makati City. This mid-rise development combines the comfort of private residences with hotel-style amenities, making it an ideal choice for professionals, travelers, and wellness enthusiasts. Just minutes from Makati’s Central Business District and Poblacion’s lively lifestyle scene, Antel Spa Suites offers the best of both convenience and relaxation.

Key Building Features

Antel Spa Suites features a boutique-style atmosphere with a modern façade and elegant interiors. The property boasts a hotel-style lobby, complete wellness amenities, and fully furnished units. With 24/7 front desk service, high-speed elevators, and a spa-inspired environment, residents enjoy a resort-like experience in the middle of the city.



Unit Configurations

Each unit is fully furnished and designed for efficient urban living. Select units feature bathtubs or in-room hot tubs, making them ideal for extended stays, business travelers, or short-term rentals.


Modern Finishes

Units come fully furnished with premium finishes including tiled flooring, a built-in kitchenette, modern bathroom fixtures, air-conditioning units, and provisions for cable TV and internet. In-room hot tubs are available in select suites, offering a spa-like atmosphere within your own space.

A premium residential tower situated at the intersection of Salamanca Street and Kalayaan Avenue in Makati’s Century City development.Located just a few blocks from the Makati Central Business District, dining, shopping, and entertainment hubs, the building enjoys both prestige and convenience. It's approximately a 30‑minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Designed by ASYA Design Partners in collaboration with the Jerde Partnership International (for master planning), and engineered by Aromin & Sy + Associates, the building features the striking "Lantern" concept—stacked glass‑box units with floor‑to‑ceiling windows that glow at nigh


Key Building Features
The tower rises to approximately 210 m with 60 aboveground floors and 4 belowground levels (some sources note minor discrepancies up to 62 above‑ground plus 5 sub‑levels).Designed as a high-end condominium, the units span a variety of floor plans and sizes. Though specific unit mix data is limited, the building’s layout and high ceiling heights speak to residential comfort and luxury appeal. The design inspiration reflects the upscale London neighborhood of Knightsbridge, signaling sophistication and elegance
.The Knightsbridge Residences delivers a harmonious blend of architectural distinction, luxurious amenities, and a premium location. From glowing glass facades to high‑ceilings and resort‑inspired facilities, the project exemplifies upscale residential urbanism in Metro Manila. Its proximity to commercial corridors, cultural nodes, and transport access makes it both a lifestyle statement and a smart investment.

title: Studio For Sale in Antel Spa, Makati City
description:
Antel Spa

Overview of the Project
This multi-tower project spans approximately 1.7 hectares and features residential suites, hotel-condo units, spa facilities, retail spaces, and wellness amenities, making it one of the first of its kind in the Philippines. Conceived in the mid‑2000s, Antel’s vision was to introduce a luxury wellness lifestyle within Makati’s urban core—an integrated resort-like condo-hotel where residents can live, relax, and rejuvenate without leaving home.

Key Building Features
The towers showcase modern, clean-lined facades with high-quality finishes, creating a striking presence along Makati Avenue. Large windows and balconies provide abundant natural light and sweeping views of Makati’s skyline and surrounding neighborhoods. The overall design draws inspiration from nature and wellness, with architectural elements reminiscent of bamboo fronds, flowing pools, garden textures, and meditative trails to evoke a calming environment amidst the city.

title: studio unit  for SALE near AMA SCHOOL OF MEDICINE in Makati
description:
A studio condo unit at Manchester Place is now available for sale at an attractive price, offering exceptional proximity to AMA School. This prime location presents a unique opportunity for medical students to invest in property that directly supports their academic journey.
The benefits for medical students are substantial. Living so close to campus eliminates daily commute stress and transportation costs, giving you more time for studying and easy access to school facilities during extended study sessions. You'll find it convenient for clinical rotations and early morning classes, with the ability to quickly return between classes for rest or meals. Financially, you'll build equity instead of paying rent with no return, with potential for rental income from roommates or during breaks. This represents a long-term investment that can appreciate in value while avoiding landlord restrictions and sudden rent increases, plus you'll enjoy tax benefits of property ownership.
From a lifestyle perspective, you'll have complete privacy and control over your living environment with the ability to customize your space for optimal studying. There are no shared living concerns with non-medical students, providing a quiet environment conducive to medical studies with ample storage space for medical books and equipment.

For serious inquiries and viewing appointments, please contact me. Remember, investment in your education deserves investment in your living situation.

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale in The Proscenium Residences, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project
Situated within the prestigious Rockwell Center, The Proscenium Residences offers a sophisticated urban lifestyle. Its strategic location provides residents with seamless access to Makati's central business district, Bonifacio Global City, and major thoroughfares like EDSA and C5. The development is also conveniently connected to the Power Plant Mall via a pedestrian bridge, enhancing its accessibility to shopping, dining, and entertainment options .

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Crafted by Carlos Ott, known for the Opéra Bastille in Paris, the towers feature modern aesthetics with full-height windows and elegant finishes .

Unit Configurations: Units range from studios (29–30 sqm) to expansive three-bedroom units (up to 268 sqm), catering to diverse lifestyle needs .

Premium Finishes: Interiors boast SMEG appliances, natural stone countertops, and soft-close built-in cabinets, ensuring a blend of style and functionality .

Be the first to own this never-been-used 3-bedroom corner unit at the prestigious Proscenium Residences by Rockwell—offering elegant living spaces, stunning city views, and world-class amenities in one of Makati’s most coveted communities.

1 Bedroom For Sale in One Rockwell East, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project:

One Rockwell East Tower is a 45-story residential condominium located in Rockwell Center, Makati City, Philippines. Completed in 2011, it is part of the One Rockwell complex developed by Rockwell Land Corporation. The tower is notable for its innovative architectural design, including Z-shaped units that provide residents with expansive views of the city. 

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Designed by Arquitectonica, the tower features a unique structure that appears as three separate buildings. The design was inspired by the Banaue Rice Terraces, incorporating double-height floor-to-ceiling glass panels to maximize natural light and views. 

Unit Configurations: The East Tower offers a variety of unit types, including one- to three-bedroom units and loft-style residences. The Z-shaped units are a signature feature, providing dual views and enhanced privacy.

Modern Finishes: Units are equipped with high-quality materials and finishes, ensuring a blend of style and functionality.

Facilities & Services
-Swimming Pools: Two outdoor swimming pools and a kiddie pool provide leisure options for residents. 
-Fitness Center: A two-story private gym club is available for residents' fitness needs. 
-Children's Playground: An outdoor play area is designed for children's recreation. 
-Sky Deck: Located on the 41st floor, the sky deck offers panoramic views of the city. 
-Function Rooms: Function rooms on the third floor are available for events and gatherings. 
-Security and Services: The building provides 24-hour security, concierge services, and secure parking facilities. 

Nearby Establishments
Shopping & Dining:
-Power Plant Mall: An upscale shopping mall offering a mix of international brands, dining options, and entertainment facilities.
-Rockwell Retail Rows: Features a variety of retail shops and restaurants within walking distance.

Educational Institutions:
-Ateneo Professional Schools: Located nearby, offering graduate programs in business and law.

Healthcare Facilities:
-Healthway Medical: A medical clinic providing various health services.

Parks and Recreation:
-Ayala Triangle Gardens: A 2-hectare urban park offering green spaces and public art installations.

title: Joya South | One Bedroom 1BR Condo Unit For Sale - #8861
Studio For Sale in Greenbelt Madison, Makati City
description:
Greenbelt Madison 

Overview of the Project
Greenbelt Madison is a 31‑storey, art‑deco–inspired residential condominium by Megaworld Corporation, completed in 2012 and turned over from mid‑2012 to 2013. Greenbelt Madison is a premium, ready-for-occupancy condo offering art-deco flair, full furnishing, comprehensive amenities, and a central location in Makati CBD. It delivers the convenience of hotel‑quality living with the comfort of a modern home.

Key Building Features
Greenbelt Madison stands as a distinguished example of urban sophistication within the heart of Makati Central Business District. Developed by Megaworld Corporation, this 31-storey residential tower merges art deco-inspired aesthetics with modern engineering, creating a structure that is both elegant and highly functional.The architectural design of Greenbelt Madison draws heavily from the timeless principles of Art Deco, a style known for its geometric lines, symmetry, and decorative elements. This inspiration is evident in the building’s clean façade, which is adorned with vertical architectural accents, pale neutral tones, and a lattice-patterned crown that adds both texture and identity to the tower’s silhouette.Its art deco influence, premium unit finishes, exclusive scale, and well-integrated amenities all contribute to a development that is more than just a residential tower—it is a lifestyle choice. In the ever-evolving skyline of Makati, Greenbelt Madison remains a benchmark for refined urban living.

Facilities & Services
24/7 Security Services
Three high-speed passenger elevators
Individual electric and water meters per unit
Ground floor retail/commercial spaces

Amenity Deck
15-meter lap pool with sun deck
Indoor spa with changing rooms
Fully equipped fitness gym
Landscaped rooftop garden and lounge areas
Function-ready common areas for leisure or relaxation

Experience the pinnacle of urban living at The Beacon, an iconic residential enclave in the heart of Makati City. Situated along Chino Roces Avenue, The Beacon offers a lifestyle of unparalleled convenience, luxury, and sophistication, making it the perfect choice for discerning individuals looking for the ultimate urban retreat.




Luxurious Residences:

Step into a world of luxury with The Beacon's meticulously designed residences. From sleek studio units to spacious one-bedroom and two-bedroom suites, each home is thoughtfully crafted to provide the utmost comfort and style, offering stunning views of the city skyline and modern amenities that cater to your every need.




Prime Location in Makati City:

The Beacon enjoys a prime location in Makati City, surrounded by the city's premier business districts, shopping centers, dining establishments, and entertainment hubs. With everything you need right at your doorstep, you'll experience the convenience of urban living at its finest.




Retail Paradise Nearby:

Indulge in world-class shopping at the nearby Greenbelt and Glorietta malls, where an array of high-end boutiques, gourmet restaurants, and entertainment options await. From designer fashion to culinary delights, these shopping destinations offer endless opportunities for indulgence and enjoyment.




Supermarket Convenience:

Experience the convenience of having premium supermarkets nearby, including Rustan's Supermarket and SM Marketplace. With a wide selection of gourmet delights and everyday essentials, grocery shopping becomes a pleasure rather than a chore, allowing you to enjoy more time for yourself.




Effortless Transportation:

The Beacon offers easy access to major transportation options, including major roads, highways, and public transit stations. Whether you prefer to drive or commute, getting around the city is a breeze, allowing you to explore all that Makati City has to offer with ease and convenience.




Educational Excellence:

Families at The Beacon have access to top-notch educational institutions such as the Asian Institute of Management (AIM) and Ateneo de Manila University Graduate School. With world-class schools nearby, you can provide your children with the best education possible in a safe and nurturing environment.




Amenities for Relaxation and Recreation:

Indulge in a lifestyle of luxury with The Beacon's exclusive amenities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, and landscaped gardens. Whether you're looking to relax or stay active, there's something for everyone at The Beacon, ensuring that every moment spent here is an opportunity to rejuvenate and unwind.




Good Investment Opportunity:

Investing in a property at The Beacon offers excellent capital yield and rental yield potential. With Makati City being a prime location for both residential and commercial properties, owning a unit at The Beacon is not only a wise investment decision but also a lucrative one, ensuring a high return on investment for years to come.




Your Gateway to Urban Luxury:

Don't miss the chance to make The Beacon your new home – where luxury meets convenience in the heart of Makati City. Whether you're seeking a place to call your own or an investment opportunity, The Beacon offers the perfect blend of style, convenience, and comfort.




Seize the opportunity to experience urban luxury like never before – arrange a viewing now and discover the allure of The Beacon!

description:
Floor Area: 59sqm




Floor Level: 43rd




Unit Type: 1BR




Furnishing: Fully Furnished 




Selling Price: Php 14,000,000 




Occupancy: Tenanted




Kroma Tower is a luxurious residential high-rise building in Makati City, Philippines, known for its modern design and sleek facade. It offers a range of residential units, from studios to penthouses, designed with high-quality finishes and efficient layouts. Amenities such as a stylish lobby, fitness center, swimming pool, and landscaped garden provide comfort and relaxation. The tower's prime location offers easy access to commercial establishments, shopping malls, and transportation hubs, making it convenient for residents to enjoy the city's offerings while prioritizing safety and security.




Kroma Tower is a prestigious address in Makati City, Philippines, offering luxurious living in a modern high-rise building. With its sleek design and floor-to-ceiling glass windows, the tower provides breathtaking views of the city. The units, available in various sizes, boast high-quality finishes and modern fixtures. Residents can enjoy a range of amenities, including a stylish lobby, fitness center, swimming pool, and landscaped garden. The tower's prime location ensures easy access to commercial establishments and transportation hubs, providing residents with a convenient and vibrant urban lifestyle. Safety is a priority, with round-the-clock security personnel and advanced surveillance systems in place.




NEARBY TRANSPORTATION





  Metro Rail Transit (MRT): The nearest MRT station to Kroma Tower is the Guadalupe Station, which is a short distance away. The MRT system provides a convenient and efficient way to navigate through Metro Manila, connecting major business districts, shopping centers, and other key destinations.

  Public Buses: Numerous public bus routes pass through Makati City, offering residents easy access to different parts of the city and neighboring areas. The major bus terminals in the vicinity include the Guadalupe Bus Terminal and the Ayala Terminal, both of which are within a reasonable distance from Kroma Tower.

  Jeepneys: Jeepneys are a popular mode of public transportation in the Philippines, and they are readily available in Makati City. These colorful and uniquely designed vehicles traverse various routes within the city, providing affordable transportation options for residents.

  Taxis and Ride-Sharing Services: Taxis and ride-sharing services like Grab and Uber are widely available in Makati City. Residents can easily hail a taxi or book a ride through the mobile applications to reach their desired destinations with convenience and comfort.

  Private Vehicles: For residents who own private vehicles, Kroma Tower provides ample parking spaces, ensuring convenient parking facilities within the building premises.


NEARBY MALLS





  Greenbelt Mall: Located within the Ayala Center, Greenbelt Mall is a premier shopping complex known for its upscale shops, boutiques, and restaurants. It features a lush and beautifully landscaped environment with interconnected sections, namely Greenbelt 1 to 5, offering a wide range of retail options, from high-end fashion brands to international and local dining establishments.

  Glorietta Mall: Also part of the Ayala Center, Glorietta Mall is one of the largest shopping centers in Makati. It boasts an extensive selection of shops, including fashion boutiques, electronics stores, home furnishings, and entertainment options. Glorietta is renowned for its diverse dining scene, housing numerous restaurants, cafes, and food courts.

  Power Plant Mall: Situated in nearby Rockwell Center, Power Plant Mall is an upscale shopping complex that offers a unique shopping experience. It features a mix of high-end brands, designer boutiques, specialty stores, and a gourmet market. The mall also houses a variety of dining options, ranging from casual eateries to fine dining restaurants.

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale in Easton Place, Makati City
description:
Easton Place  
Overview of the Project 
Easton Place, completed in 1987, is a single-tower high-rise standing around 37 floors tall. Developed and owned by Vernida Realty, it features spacious layouts within one of Makati’s most prestigious neighborhoods. Easton Place remains a trusted, mid‑rise classic in Salcedo Village, cherished for its spacious layouts, time-tested amenities, and rock‑solid security. Its location offers direct access to urban conveniences—malls, cafés, top schools, hospitals, and green walkways—making it ideal for families, professionals, and long-term residents seeking a balanced lifestyle in central Makati.

Key Building Features:
Architectural Design: Easton Place was designed by Wong & Tung International Ltd, a Hong Kong-based architectural firm known for residential, commercial, and mixed-use developments across Asia. Their portfolio includes high-rise structures that balance functionality with contemporary elegance.

Unit Configurations: 
Easton Place distinguishes itself through its entirely mid- to large-sized units—two bedrooms (125 sqm) and three bedrooms (189 sqm)—each offering maid's room and balconies, making them rare urban homes with comfort, functionality, and space lacking in newer, denser developments.

Modern Finishes: Easton Place in Salcedo Village, Makati, may have been constructed in the late 1980s, but its interiors—particularly in upgraded units—reflect a thoughtful transition into modern living. Many residents and investors have recognized the value of its generous floor plans and have chosen to renovate with contemporary aesthetics, smart layouts, and updated fixtures. The result is a blend of timeless spatial design with finishes that match today’s standards of urban sophistication.
One of the most prominent features in many upgraded units is the flooring. Original parquet wood floors have either been restored or replaced with high-quality engineered wood or vinyl planks in soft, earthy tones. 


Facilities & Services
24/7 perimeter security
CCTV surveillance

Amenity Deck
Swimming Pool
Sun Deck

Function Room
Landscaped Open Spaces

title: Studio For Sale in One Central, Makati City
description:
One Central 
Overview of the Project 
One Central is a premier dual-tower condominium located at the corner of Senator Gil Puyat Avenue and Geronimo Street in Bel‑Air, Makati. Launched in 2012 by Megaworld, the development consists of two elegantly curved towers—50 and 42 stories—featuring a sleek glass-and-concrete façade that shifts in hue from blue to aqua. The towers were designed by acclaimed international firms Preben Kent and Gettys Chicago, lending them a distinctive modernist and Art Deco fusion aesthetic 

Key Building Features:
Architectural Design: Designed by international architectural firms Preben Kent and interior specialists Gettys Chicago, the development is a two-tower masterpiece that introduces bold curves and Art Deco elements into the heart of Makati’s Central Business District. Rising 50 and 42 stories respectively, the towers were intentionally crafted with a boomerang-shaped layout, a distinctive silhouette that adds dimension and dynamism to the city’s skyline. 

Unit Configurations: 
Studio Deluxe units, typically ranging from (31- 33 sqm), one-bedroom offer  (47- 56sqm)(some with balconies). two up to five bedroom+ loft ranges (105-232sqm)

Modern Finishes: Each residential unit is meticulously designed to reflect a balance of elegance, functionality, and international-standard quality, catering to the expectations of professionals, executives, and city dwellers who value luxury and efficiency.

The flooring throughout the living, dining, and bedroom areas features wood-style laminated planks, chosen for their warmth, durability, and modern aesthetic. These surfaces are not only easy to maintain but also lend a homey contrast to the building’s striking glass-and-steel exterior.


Facilities & Services
24/7 Concierge and Front Desk Services
Security System with CCTV Surveillance
High-Speed Elevators
Function Rooms and Business Center for meetings and events

Amenity Deck
Lap Pool and Kiddie Pool with water features

Mini-Theater, Game Room, and Internet Lounge

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale in The Proscenium Residences, Makati City
description:
The Proscenium Residences 

Overview of the Project
Situated within the prestigious Rockwell Center, The Proscenium Residences offers a sophisticated urban lifestyle. Its strategic location provides residents with seamless access to Makati's central business district, Bonifacio Global City, and major thoroughfares like EDSA and C5. The development is also conveniently connected to the Power Plant Mall via a pedestrian bridge, enhancing its accessibility to shopping, dining, and entertainment options .

Key Building Features
Architectural Design: Crafted by Carlos Ott, known for the Opéra Bastille in Paris, the towers feature modern aesthetics with full-height windows and elegant finishes .

Unit Configurations: Units range from studios (29–30 sqm) to expansive three-bedroom units (up to 268 sqm), catering to diverse lifestyle needs .

Premium Finishes: Interiors boast SMEG appliances, natural stone countertops, and soft-close built-in cabinets, ensuring a blend of style and functionality .

Safety and Convenience: Features include high-speed elevators, 100% backup power, advanced fire detection systems, and electronic access controls .

Facilities & Services
Performing Arts Theater: A 600-seat venue designed to host world-class cultural performances, enhancing the community's artistic ambiance .

Lorraine Tower at the Proscenium in Makati City is a 42-story luxury residential tower developed by Rockwell Land, offering spacious units, premium finishes, and access to world-class amenities within an integrated community featuring a performing arts theater and retail spaces.




Key Building Features

Architectural Design: Lorraine Tower features a distinct architectural design by Carlos Ott, highlighted by its elegant vertical fins, rooftop sail-like canopies, and full-height windows that create a sculptural silhouette while maximizing natural light and panoramic views.




Unit Configurations: Lorraine Tower offers spacious unit configurations, including 2-bedroom units ranging from 97 to 129 sqm, 3-bedroom units from 138 to 205 sqm, and exclusive 4-bedroom penthouses spanning approximately 390 sqm.




Premium Finishes: Units at Lorraine Tower feature premium finishes such as engineered wood flooring, natural stone countertops, custom cabinetry, high-grade bathroom fixtures, and floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural lighting and views.




Safety and Convenience: Lorraine Tower ensures safety and convenience through 24/7 security, CCTV surveillance, access-controlled entry, high-speed elevators, backup power systems, and a dedicated concierge service for residents' daily needs.

title: 3 Bedroom For Sale in St. Moritz Private Estate, Taguig City
description:
St. Moritz Private Estate




Overview of the Project

St. Moritz Private Estate is an ultra-luxury residential condominium located in McKinley West, Fort Bonifacio, developed by Megaworld Corporation. Inspired by modern European design, it offers exclusive, low-density living with interiors by Armani Casa and architecture by Broadway Malyan. Units range from 2- to 4-bedroom suites and penthouses, featuring private lift lobbies, smart home systems, and premium European finishes.




Key Building Features

St. Moritz Private Estate offers ultra-luxury, low-density living with private elevator access, smart home-ready units, and floor-to-ceiling glass windows. Interiors are designed by Armani/Casa, featuring premium European finishes from Leicht, Bosch, and Gaggenau. Residents enjoy spacious balconies, secure basement parking, and top-tier amenities, all within a high-security, energy-efficient environment.




Facilities & Services

St. Moritz offers resort-style facilities including an infinity pool, gym, function rooms, landscaped gardens, and a children’s play area. Services include 24/7 concierge, security, smart home integration, private basement parking, and dedicated property management—ensuring luxury, comfort, and convenience for residents.

Salcedo Park residential development in Salcedo Village, Makati City, offering spacious units, resort-style amenities, and a prime location near Salcedo Park and the Makati central business district.

title: 1 Bedroom Condo Unit for sale at The Rise Makati by Shang Properties Ayala Ave
description:
The Rise in North Makati or NoMa will be Shang Properties’ 3rd condominium project in Makati. Its 3,044 residential units sit atop a two-level boutique mall that will feature cafes, convenience stores, and other services that will offer residents comfortable and stylish living without needing to venture far away.




At 59 storeys high, The Rise will offer innovative lifestyle choices in a dynamic neighborhood teeming with galleries, delicatessens and bistros, indie music venues and unique retail destinations. Among The Rise’s unique amenities is The Hangout, a 300 square meter open lounge for entertaining friends and loved ones.




For meetings and school or work-related activities, there is The Workshop that offers an IT bar, a library, reading room, meeting rooms and other quiet nooks and spaces. The Nest, on the other hand, is designed for wellness and relaxation, a welcome refuge from the hustle and bustle of city life. It is one’s very own private space within the building that is perfect for a good read or for just hanging around and curling up.




Other project features include a tropical pool and children’s pool, a jogging trail, children’s play space, barbecue patio, and a fully equipped and modern gym.




H E A L T H  &  M E D I C A L




The best hospitals and medical facilities in the country are conveniently located very near The Rise Makati, including the renowned  Makati Medical Center, St. Clare Medical Center 




S C H O O L S  &  U N I V E R S I T I E S




Makati is the ideal neighborhood for young professionals, with some of the most prestigious schools in the country within walking distance - such as Don Bosco, CEU Makati, Mapua University Makati, St. Paul School of Makati and Colegio San Agustin Makati.




S H O P P I N G  &  D I N I N G




Access the ﬁnest shopping, entertainment, and dining experiences Manila has to offer from your base at Makati. Delight in the markets of Glorietta, revel in the latest and greatest international brands at Greenbelt, and explore and discover new retail experiences across a range of other malls like Circuit Makati , and SM Makati - all at your very ﬁngertips.




Our proposed development will be a Sixty Three (63) storey residential & commercial with units ranging from studio, one (1), two (2) bedrooms, as well as a residential lobby and one (1) floor of amenities and facilities. 2 floors botique mall.  




FIRST COME, FIRST SERVED BASIS.




Call or message me anytime.




I'll be more than happy to assist you.




See you! Book your reservations now!




Be the First to Own Your Property for Keeps

title: 3 Bedroom Rockwell Proscenium Condominium For Sale in Makati City
description:
FOR SALE




The Proscenium at Rockwell

Rockwell Center, Makati City, Metro Manila




3 Bedrooms 3.5 T&B 162 sqm

- Master's Bedroom has a Walk-in Closet

- with 2 Parking Slots (Tandem)

- All Units with Ensuite Bathrooms

- With Powder Room for Guests

- A Kitchen Door was added by the Owner

- with Maid’s / Utility Area

- with Rental Income (Great for investors!) 

- The buyer must honor the 1 year lease contract. Current lease contract started around Holy Week of 2024

- Low Floor




Accepting Offers from PHP 70,000,000 above

Kindly set viewings 1 week in advance, Thank you!




The Proscenium at Rockwell is a premier luxury condominium development located in the exclusive Rockwell Center, Makati. Designed by internationally renowned architect Carlos Ott, the Proscenium is composed of five architecturally distinct residential towers: Kirov, Sakura, Lincoln, Lorraine, and The Proscenium Residences. These towers offer low-density living with spacious units ranging from studios to expansive three-bedroom suites, ideal for individuals or families seeking privacy, comfort, and elegance.




Spanning 3.6 hectares, the development features a unique blend of upscale amenities. Residents enjoy access to a 1-hectare amenity deck with multiple pools, a Floating River, tennis courts, landscaped gardens, and a grand lawn. A 600-seat performing arts theater highlights the development’s cultural sophistication, while fully equipped gyms, themed lounges, and function rooms support wellness and social activities. Each tower includes exclusive lounges and libraries, reflecting its unique design theme.




Strategically positioned, the Proscenium offers direct access to Power Plant Mall via a pedestrian bridge, providing residents with premium retail, dining, and entertainment options. Its central location near J.P. Rizal Avenue and Estrella Street ensures excellent connectivity to Makati’s business district, top schools, and other key establishments.




Enhanced with advanced security systems, 100% backup power, and concierge-level services, the Proscenium delivers luxury, convenience, and safety. It is an ideal investment for those seeking refined urban living in one of Metro Manila’s most desirable communities.

title: For Sale Maple Place 2 Bedroom Condo with Parking Acacia Estates Taguig City
description:
Maple Place by DMCI Homes is the 3rd low rise compound inside Acacia Estates from the entrance. A few minutes drive to Mckinley Hill , Bonifacio Global City, Makati CBD. It is also accessible to Ortigas Center and Eastwood City via C5.




It is a short walk to Levi Mariano Ave and also Acacia Town Center where Save More and the rest of the commercial area is.




New road with direct access to C6 and Bicutan is now available to Acacia Estate residents.




This compound is new & the least dense among the Acacia Estates low rise developments with only 382 units. Most have 3x the number of buildings.




With only 3 low rise buildings- amenities will be enjoyed by fewer residents. Less crowded.




2 pools, playground, garden, picnic area, big lounge & lobby area & a gym




63.5 sqm 2 Bedroom 1 T&B, balcony and drying cage/ utility area, parking

Unit is in the 3rd floor Linden building, facing pool and amenities

Price include Capital Gains Tax

title: 3 Bedroom For Sale In Lorraine Tower at The Proscenium, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project:

Lorraine Tower at the Proscenium in Makati City is a 42-story luxury residential tower developed by Rockwell Land, offering spacious units, premium finishes, and access to world-class amenities within an integrated community featuring a performing arts theater and retail spaces.




Key Building Features Architectural Design: Lorraine Tower features a distinct architectural design by Carlos Ott, highlighted by its elegant vertical fins, rooftop sail-like canopies, and full-height windows that create a sculptural silhouette while maximizing natural light and panoramic views.




Unit Configurations: Lorraine Tower offers spacious unit configurations, including 2-bedroom units ranging from 97 to 129 sqm, 3-bedroom units from 138 to 205 sqm, and exclusive 4-bedroom penthouses spanning approximately 390 sqm.




Premium Finishes: Units at Lorraine Tower feature premium finishes such as engineered wood flooring, natural stone countertops, custom cabinetry, high-grade bathroom fixtures, and floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural lighting and views.




Safety and Convenience: Lorraine Tower ensures safety and convenience through 24/7 security, CCTV surveillance, access-controlled entry, high-speed elevators, backup power systems, and a dedicated concierge service for residents' daily needs.







Facilities & Services:

-Landscaped gardens

-Five resort style pools

-Outdoor tennis court

-Function rooms for events
