title: Fire Sale! Spacious 4BR Luxury Condo for Sale in Avignon Tower
description:
CP-RS




Fire Sale! Spacious 4BR Luxury Condo for Sale in Avignon Tower




Welcome to Avignon Tower !




Setting it apart from most condominium projects, Avignon Tower only has two unit types—three- and four-bedroom suites—per floor, designed especially for large families that dream of a home in the city. Avignon Tower’s three-bedroom units typically feature a den, four toilets and baths, and two maid’s quarters. Four-bedroom suites normally include a foyer, maid’s and driver’s rooms with own toilet and bath, and a utility room. Additional features include a parking garage and high-speed elevators. Unlike most residential condos, Avignon Tower has no amenities because of its mission to provide space and comfort. And to ensure that residents are safe and well-guarded, Avignon Tower offers a 24-hour security service, CCTV monitoring, automatic sprinkler system, and backup generator. Conveniently located along H.V. Dela Costa Street, Salcedo Village in Makati City, Avignon Tower is a stone’s throw away from Glorietta Mall, Greenbelt Mall, The Landmark, Makati Sports Club, and The Link.




Property Features:




This sprawling apartment has been transformed into a ‘piece de resistance’ by the Philanthropist couple owners.

The light-filled home has an expansive open plan hub that combines the living and dining areas (approximately 95 m2), alongside walls of picture windows from end to end (from the common areas all the way to the private nooks) as well as floor to ceiling navy blue ladened subway tiles by the mini-bar nook. The entire hub ceiling is cladded w/ faux wood paneling encompassing the living, dining areas including all four private bedrooms and four bathrooms, whereas the entire walls are adorned with a soothing mint green wallpaper for that rich texture. As you alight from the lift, one can easily relax as you enter your own private wide foyer (approx. 15 m2) where one is greeted by a 60 inch Narra double door entry.




Floor area: 323.17 sqm

4 bedrooms

4 bathrooms

OPEN CONCEPT LIVING & DINING areas w/ combined 75 m2 floor area, more or less

MINI BAR LOUNGE complete w/ a ‘Prep’ Table & sink

Resort SPA-like sprawling Primary Bath w/ dual vanity sinks individually separated for his and her use; a soaking Tub w/ own shower fixtures; another separate walk-in Shower cladded w/ Brass fittings seen only in a Homes & Garden magazine - so two people can shower separately at the same time. After all, the Master of the home cannot be made to wait

Guest’s Powder Room

Enclosed sprawling Main Kitchen (FA: 30m2)

Auxiliary Kitchen

Utility area w/ built-in Washer and Dryer provisions

Separate Service entrance for wet goods

Separate Servant’s & Driver’s quarters installed w/ windows for natural lighting; w/ own separate baths

Comes semi-furnished w/ AC’s

Immaculate clean CCTitle

2 appurtenant Parking slots

description:

 Welcome to Belton Place !
 

 Turned over in 2012, this 40-storey tower offers spacious and cozy studio- type, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom units, which range from 21 square meters to 25 square meters, 30 square meters to 42 square meters, 45 square meters to 56 square meters, and 60 square meters respectively. Offering leisure to residents and their guests, Belton Place offers top-notch amenities that include adult and kiddie pools, a fitness gym, children’s play area, jogging path, landscaped gardens, and a function room. And because a hard day’s work requires a little relaxation and pampering, Belton Place also has meditation areas and establishments that offer therapeutic and cosmetic services. Added condo features include phone and cable TV provision, three high-speed elevators, 24-hour security and CCTV monitoring for common areas and elevators, a driver's lounge, an administrative office, fire and smoke detection system, stand-by emergency power, guest audio annunciator for all units, water reservoir, and separate fire reserve. Situated in Yakal Street corner Chino Roces Avenue, Makati City, Belton Place is a stone’s throw away from restaurants, shops, offices, and Makati’s two main arteries—Ayala and Buendia Avenues.

title: Ultra-Luxury Penthouse Bi-Level Unit for Sale in Two Roxas Triangle, Makati City
description:
CEO-RS
 

 Ultra-Luxury Penthouse Bi-Level Unit for Sale in Two Roxas Triangle, Makati City
 Welcome to Two Roxas Triangle !
 

 Roxas Triangle Towers is a two-tower development piercing the skyline at the heart of a great city.
 

 The Two Roxas Triangle units are also clear manifestations of its rarity. The entire 52-level tower only contains a total of 182 units. Its exclusivity is even raised by several notches as each floor only has four units in comparison with a typical high-end building that has about 10 to 12 units.
 

 The smallest unit at the tower is 302 sq m, and the biggest cut expands all the way to 550 sq m. Furthermore, the tower’s garden level has two units. Standard units are then located from the fourth to the 41st floor. Higher than these floors is what the developers call the sky units. Beyond the sky are the penthouses, four of which are bi-level and three are flats.
 

 The design of Two Roxas Tower is consistent with the first tower—the unit layouts to an extent the façade design.
 

 Unit Features:
 Bi-level
 High-ceiling
 Facing Urdaneta Village
 4 bedrooms
 4 bathrooms
 Family area
 Show kitchen
 Auxiliary kitchen
 4 parking slots
 Maid’s room
 Floor area 550 sqm

title: 2-Bedroom Condominium for Sale in The Rise Makati by Shangri-La
description:
CODE CP-RS




2BR Condo for Sale  in The Rise Makati by Shangri-La




Welcome to The Rise Makati !




Located conveniently just north of Ayala Avenue along Malugay St., Makati City, The Rise is only eight minutes away from the Makati Central Business District. The area is known for its unique mix of galleries, delicatessens, bistros, and unique retail experiences.




Expect nothing less from a luxury hotel brand--The Rise Makati focused on bringing top-notch amenities to its residents. The amenities, dubbed as “Spaces at the Rise”, are divided into The Hangout, The Nest, and The Workshop. The Hangout is a 300 square meter space of open lounge area, The Nest is a relaxation and wellness area with swinging hammocks and garden terraces, and The Workshop is a fully stocked workroom, which features an I.T. bar, a library, a reading room, and multi-purpose function rooms and spaces.




The Rise also boasts of a 28 meter tropical pool and kids’ pool, a 380-meter private jogging path set in lush green landscaping, a 280 square meter children’s play space, a barbecue patio, and a two-storey world-class gym. There is also a 2-level boutique retail mall conveniently located right below the residences.




Property Features:




West Wing

58th floor

2 bedrooms

2 bathrooms

Floor area 73 sqm

title: 2BR Fully Furnished Condo unit for Sale in The Residences at Greenbelt, Makati
description:
JP-CP
 

 Welcome to The Residences at Greenbelt !
 

 Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The first of three buildings is the Laguna Tower, a 48-story tower that was turned over in 2009. San Lorenzo Tower, the second, is the highest of the three standing at 204.5 meters. This 57-storey skyscraper was inaugurated in 2010. Standing at 170.75 meters is the third building, which is the 48-story Manila Tower. All three skyscrapers showcase a four-level podium with commercial establishments and three basement levels for parking. Regular units at The Residences at Greenbelt include 57-square-meter one-bedroom executive suites, 66-square-meter one-bedroom residences, 106-square-meter two-bedroom units, and 165-square-meter three-bedroom residences. Facilities include a adult lap pool, a kiddie pool, a children's playground, an indoor play area, a fitness center, a spa, a mini-theatre, a game room, a pond, rock and water features, a Zen-inspired meditation garden, a sky deck on the 50th floor, a grand social hall, and a multipurpose lawn. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.
 

 Unit features:
 Manila Tower
 Fully furnished
 Spacious
 2 bedrooms
 2 bathrooms
 Maid’s room with bathroom
 2 parking slots (tandem)

description:
CODE CP-RS







Spacious Studio Unit for Sale in The Manansala Rockwell, Makati




Welcome to The Manansala Rockwell !




An epitome of diversity, this resplendent landmark combines spacious living and utmost convenience seamlessly. Greeting residents and their guests is an Asian-themed lobby, making this residential condominium a feast for the eyes. Offering a proud selection of studio, one-, two-, and three-bedroom units, comfort is experienced at its finest. Putting leisure and relaxation in mind, this haven boasts of amenities and facilities that include an adult swimming pool, a lap pool, a kiddie pool, and function rooms on the 38th floor to accommodate formal parties, wedding receptions, business events, and intimate affairs. At The Manansala Rockwell, the safety and convenience of its residents and their guests are always a top priority. The condominium provides services that include 24/7 roving guards, a 24-hour convenience store, Laundromat, and alterations shop. Because of its strategic location in Rockwell Center, The Manansala Rockwell is a stroll away from Power Plant Mall, Ateneo Graduate School of Business, St. Paul College, and it is a few minutes drive away from the Makati central business district and EDSA.

title: 2BR Fully Furnished Unit for Sale in The Residences at Greenbelt, Makati
description:
Code:MP-CP




2BR Fully Furnished Unit for Sale in The Residences at Greenbelt, Makati




Welcome to The Residences at Greenbelt !




Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The first of three buildings is the Laguna Tower, a 48-story tower that was turned over in 2009. San Lorenzo Tower, the second, is the highest of the three standing at 204.5 meters. This 57-storey skyscraper was inaugurated in 2010. Standing at 170.75 meters is the third building, which is the 48-story Manila Tower. All three skyscrapers showcase a four-level podium with commercial establishments and three basement levels for parking. Regular units at The Residences at Greenbelt include 57-square-meter one-bedroom executive suites, 66-square-meter one-bedroom residences, 106-square-meter two-bedroom units, and 165-square-meter three-bedroom residences. Facilities include a adult lap pool, a kiddie pool, a children's playground, an indoor play area, a fitness center, a spa, a mini-theatre, a game room, a pond, rock and water features, a Zen-inspired meditation garden, a sky deck on the 50th floor, a grand social hall, and a multipurpose lawn. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.




Unit features:

Fully furnished

Spacious

2 bedrooms

3 bathrooms

Maid’s room with bathroom

1 parking slot

Floor area 123 sqm

• 1 year advance, 2 months security deposit

title: Beautifully Designed 3BR Corner Unit for Sale in Park Terraces, Makati City
description:
CODE CP-RS




Beautifully Designed 3BR Corner Unit for Sale/Rent in Park Terraces, Makati City







Welcome to Park Terraces!




This three-tower development will showcase spacious units: studio at 42 square meters, one bedroom at 71 square meters, special one bedroom at 88 square meters, two bedroom at 106 square meters, special two bedroom at 140 square meters, three bedroom at 179 square meters, and three bedroom penthouse at 269 square meters.




For leisure and convenience, Park Terraces will feature amenities such as an outdoor infinity lap pool, fully equipped fitness center, indoor and outdoor children’s play area, courtyard gardens at the podium level, a social hall, and function rooms. Towers 1 and 2 will share a lobby and podium amenities. The ground level will have retail spaces for establishments like restaurants, cafés, and wellness outlets.




Park Terraces will boast of a contiguous basement parking with an underground connection to the basement parking system of Ayala Center, as well as a pedestrian access to Glorietta Mall. This unrivaled convenience will allow residents multiple access points to and from the main avenues of Makati City.

3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms

Fully furnished

title: Beautifully Designed 2BR Unit for Sale in San Lorenzo Place, Makati City
description:
CODE CP-RS
 

 Beautifully Designed 2BR Unit for Sale/Rent in San Lorenzo Place, Makati City
 

 

 Welcome to San Lorenzo Place !
 

 San Lorenzo Place, a luxury residential project of Empire East Land Holdings Inc., makes the Makati CBD lifestyle more accessible than ever before. Located at the junction of Chino Roces Avenue and EDSA, it’s the address of choice for those 
 

 who want to be part of the city’s exciting dynamic.
 Living here means enjoying a quick link to work. The project’s location brings business, financial and banking institutions, multinational companies, foreign embassies and consulates closer, so future residents have the privilege to do more and be more right where they are. But it’s not just the corporate world that is easily accessible.
 

 Those that prioritize post-graduate learning will find the Makati CBD ripe with options as the Ateneo Graduate School of Business, Ateneo School of Law, Asian Institute of Management and De La Salle Professional Schools are just minutes away. Also nearby are the upscale Greenbelt district, Glorietta and the retail establishments of Rockwell, which serve up many fun ways to unwind.
 As a home in the middle of a vibrant city, San Lorenzo Place is an exceptional haven.
 

 Unit Features:
 

 Connected to MRT, with mall and grocery
 Floor area of 77 sqm
 2 bedrooms (with master suite with office space)

title: 3 Bedroom For Sale In Lorraine Tower at The Proscenium, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project:

Lorraine Tower at the Proscenium in Makati City is a 42-story luxury residential tower developed by Rockwell Land, offering spacious units, premium finishes, and access to world-class amenities within an integrated community featuring a performing arts theater and retail spaces.




Key Building Features Architectural Design: Lorraine Tower features a distinct architectural design by Carlos Ott, highlighted by its elegant vertical fins, rooftop sail-like canopies, and full-height windows that create a sculptural silhouette while maximizing natural light and panoramic views.




Unit Configurations: Lorraine Tower offers spacious unit configurations, including 2-bedroom units ranging from 97 to 129 sqm, 3-bedroom units from 138 to 205 sqm, and exclusive 4-bedroom penthouses spanning approximately 390 sqm.




Premium Finishes: Units at Lorraine Tower feature premium finishes such as engineered wood flooring, natural stone countertops, custom cabinetry, high-grade bathroom fixtures, and floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural lighting and views.




Safety and Convenience: Lorraine Tower ensures safety and convenience through 24/7 security, CCTV surveillance, access-controlled entry, high-speed elevators, backup power systems, and a dedicated concierge service for residents' daily needs.




Facilities & Services:

-Landscaped gardens

-Five resort style pools

-Outdoor tennis court 

-Fully equipped fitness center

-Function rooms for events

-Daycare centers for children 

-Library

-24/7 Security

-High speed elevators




Nearby Establishments

Shopping & Dining:

-Power Plant Mall: Offers a mix of international brands and upscale dining options .

- One Rockwell Retail Rows: Home to luxury brands like Comme des Garçons and Balenciaga .

prosceniumrockwellmakati.com

title: Two Roxas Triangle, Makati City - Ultra-Luxury Bi-Level Penthouse for Sale
description:
CODE CP-RS




Ultra-Luxury Bi-Level Penthouse For Sale in Two Roxas Triangle, Makati City




Welcome to Two Roxas Triangle!




Roxas Triangle Towers is a two-tower development piercing the skyline at the heart of a great city.




The Two Roxas Triangle units are also clear manifestations of its rarity. The entire 52-level tower only contains a total of 182 units. Its exclusivity is even raised by several notches as each floor only has four units in comparison with a typical high-end building that has about 10 to 12 units.




The smallest unit at the tower is 302 sq m, and the biggest cut expands all the way to 550 sq m. Furthermore, the tower’s garden level has two units. Standard units are then located from the fourth to the 41st floor. Higher than these floors is what the developers call the sky units. Beyond the sky are the penthouses, four of which are bi-level and three are flats.




The design of Two Roxas Tower is consistent with the first tower—the unit layouts to an extent the façade design.




*** Unit features:




Brand new!

Bi-Level penthouse unit

3 bedrooms

3 bathrooms

title: Brand New 2BR Condominium in The Rise Makati for Sale
description:
ND-CP
 
 
 *** For BUYERS ONLY ***
 

 

 Brand New 2BR Condo in The Rise Makati for Sale
 

 

 

 Welcome to The Rise Makati !
 
 Located conveniently just north of Ayala Avenue along Malugay St., Makati City, The Rise is only eight minutes away from the Makati Central Business District. The area is known for its unique mix of galleries, delicatessens, bistros, and unique retail experiences.
 Expect nothing less from a luxury hotel brand--The Rise Makati focused on bringing top-notch amenities to its residents. The amenities, dubbed as “Spaces at the Rise”, are divided into The Hangout, The Nest, and The Workshop. The Hangout is a 300 square meter space of open lounge area, The Nest is a relaxation and wellness area with swinging hammocks and garden terraces, and The Workshop is a fully stocked workroom, which features an I.T. bar, a library, a reading room, and multi-purpose function rooms and spaces.
 The Rise also boasts of a 28 meter tropical pool and kids’ pool, a 380-meter private jogging path set in lush green landscaping, a 280 square meter children’s play space, a barbecue patio, and a two-storey world-class gym. There is also a 2-level boutique retail mall conveniently located right below the residences.
 

 Property Features:
 West Wing
 43rdfloor
 Ready to occupy unit w/ nothing to fix
 2 bedrooms
 2 bathrooms
 1 parking slot
 Floor area 72 sqm

title: Newly Renovated Luxury Condo for Sale in Ritz Towers, Ayala Avenue Makati
description:
Newly Renovated Luxury Condo for Sale in Ritz Towers, Ayala Avenue




Welcome to Ritz Towers!




This twin-tower residence lets the urban dweller experience utmost comfort and unparalleled lifestyle. Aiming to maximize space without compromising aesthetics, each tower features only 110 three- and four-bedroom units, hence, a total of 220 units. Letting residents and their guests enjoy city living at its best, the building boasts of premium amenities and facilities, which include a heated swimming pool with water features, a spa, a fitness gym, and a conference room. Added features and services include a stunning lobby, an administration office, an engineering office, two levels of underground parking, and round-the-clock security with camera surveillance. Nestled at 6745 Ayala Avenue, The Ritz Towers is the choice residence of some of Manila's top businessmen, diplomats, and celebrities due to its close proximity to the central financial district. With its posh address, The Ritz Towers is also an arm’s length away from Greenbelt Mall, Glorietta Mall, The Peninsula Manila, Makati Shangri-La Hotel, The Enterprise, and Philippine Stock Exchange.




Unit features:

Newly renovated

Ready for occupancy

Spacious

3 bedrooms

3 bathrooms

2 parking slots

Balcony is facing Ayala Avenue and Urdaneta Village

Floor area 263 sqm

Price --- Php 56.99 million

title: 2BR Condo Unit for Salet in The Residences at Greenbelt, Makati
description:
Code: CP-WS




Welcome to The Residences at Greenbelt !




Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The first of three buildings is the Laguna Tower, a 48-story tower that was turned over in 2009. San Lorenzo Tower, the second, is the highest of the three standing at 204.5 meters. This 57-storey skyscraper was inaugurated in 2010. Standing at 170.75 meters is the third building, which is the 48-story Manila Tower. All three skyscrapers showcase a four-level podium with commercial establishments and three basement levels for parking. Regular units at The Residences at Greenbelt include 57-square-meter one-bedroom executive suites, 66-square-meter one-bedroom residences, 106-square-meter two-bedroom units, and 165-square-meter three-bedroom residences. Facilities include a adult lap pool, a kiddie pool, a children’s playground, an indoor play area, a fitness center, a spa, a mini-theatre, a game room, a pond, rock and water features, a Zen-inspired meditation garden, a sky deck on the 50th floor, a grand social hall, and a multipurpose lawn. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.

San Lorenzo Tower

Semi-furnished

2 bedrooms

2 bathrooms

description:
Code: CP-WS
 

 Welcome to Ritz Towers!
 

 This twin-tower residence lets the urban dweller experience utmost comfort and unparalleled lifestyle. Aiming to maximize space without compromising aesthetics, each tower features only 110 three- and four-bedroom units, hence, a total of 220 units. Letting residents and their guests enjoy city living at its best, the building boasts of premium amenities and facilities, which include a heated swimming pool with water features, a spa, a fitness gym, and a conference room. Added features and services include a stunning lobby, an administration office, an engineering office, two levels of underground parking, and round-the-clock security with camera surveillance. Nestled at 6745 Ayala Avenue, The Ritz Towers is the choice residence of some of Manila's top businessmen, diplomats, and celebrities due to its close proximity to the central financial district. With its posh address, The Ritz Towers is also an arm’s length away from Greenbelt Mall, Glorietta Mall, The Peninsula Manila, Makati Shangri-La Hotel, The Enterprise, and Philippine Stock Exchange.

description:
CCP-RS
 Beautiful 2BR Bi-Level Corner Unit for Sale/Rent in The Columns, Makati City Welcome to The Columns !
 

 This stunning landmark offers close to 800 new residential units. Studio rooms measure 30 to 33 square meters; junior one-bedroom suites measure 38 to 40 square meters; one-bedroom suites measure approximately 47 square meters; and two-bedroom residences measure 67 to 77 square meters. Standard unit features include modular bedroom closets, provision for cable TV and telephone line, bay windows for selected studio and one-bedroom loft units, complete kitchen cabinet system, natural ventilation for kitchen and bathroom areas, laundry area for one- and two-bedroom loft units, maid’s room for two-bedroom units, and a guest annunciator system. Combining privacy and leisure seamlessly, The Columns Legaspi offers club-like amenities that fit the needs of the urban individual: a 25-meter lap pool, a kiddie pool, a 450-square-meter fitness gym, a kid's play area, al fresco dining, a landscaped jogging path, a sun deck, a guest room, and function rooms. Straddling the corners of Arnaiz Avenue and Amorsolo Street, The Columns Legaspi is near a myriad of shops, restaurants, coffee shops, and offices.  This beautifully designed 1-bedroom condominium unit is located on the 40th floor of The Milano Residences by Versace in Makati CBD. With 55.48 sqm of space, high-end furnishings, and a large balcony offering an unobstructed view of the stunning Manila Bay sunset, this corner unit is perfect for those who appreciate modern luxury and convenience. Milano Residences is known for its world-class amenities and prime location, making it one of the most sought-after addresses in the city.

At PHP 28.5M, this is a rare opportunity to own a high-floor unit at a price lower than the zonal value, making it a smart investment in Makati’s vibrant real estate market.

 Floor Level: 62nd

*** For DIRECT BUYERS ONLY ***




Why Ritz Towers Is a Perfect Choice for You

The Ritz Towers in Makati City stands in a strategic location. As it is close to key establishments, residents find everything they need very accessible. If you make these twin towers your next home, you can simply walk to SM Makati or Glorietta for your weekend retail therapy or catch-up with friends. Greenbelt and Century City Mall are nearby as well. Top hospitals in the city are easily reachable, including Makati Medical Center, Medical Plaza Makati, and St. Clare's Medical Center.

As for schools, you won't have to drive long miles to get your kids to class. Reputable institutions are only a short drive away. title: 2BR Bi-Level Condo Unit w/ Garden for Sale in The Residences at Greenbelt Makati
description:
JP-CP - D




Welcome to The Residences at Greenbelt !




Sitting on top of a generously landscaped podium lined with restaurants and retail outlets, this high-end community comprises the Laguna, San Lorenzo, and Manila Towers. The first of three buildings is the Laguna Tower, a 48-storey tower that was turned over in 2009. San Lorenzo Tower, the second, is the highest of the three standing at 204.5 meters. This 57-storey skyscraper was inaugurated in 2010. Standing at 170.75 meters is the third building, which is the 48-story Manila Tower. All three skyscrapers showcase a four-level podium with commercial establishments and three basement levels for parking. Regular units at The Residences at Greenbelt include 57-square-meter one-bedroom executive suites, 66-square-meter one-bedroom residences, 106-square-meter two-bedroom units, and 165-square-meter three-bedroom residences. Facilities include a adult lap pool, a kiddie pool, a children’s playground, an indoor play area, a fitness center, a spa, a mini-theatre, a game room, a pond, rock and water features, a Zen-inspired meditation garden, a sky deck on the 50th floor, a grand social hall, and a multipurpose lawn. Nestled along Antonio Arnaiz Avenue in Makati City, The Residences at Greenbelt is a short five minutes from the Makati central business district by car.

description:
Be among the elite few owners of this prestigious development, along Ayala Avenue Makati.
 

 The Estate Makati
 

 The Estate Makati is a high-rise residential condominium project at the heart of Makati Central Business District along Ayala Avenue, Makati City, carrying the SMDC and Federal Land brand. The development promises to deliver an exclusive and distinctive living experience.
 

 The Estate Makati is a high-rise residential condominium that features commanding skyline views and unparalleled access to all the important places in Makati City.
 

 The Estate Makati promises to offer multi-faceted fun living right within the master planned. Homeowners will benefit from an upscale living experience that will uniquely cultivate personal interests and vibrant sensibilities in a home that’s simply a beat from Makati busy urban landscape.
 

 Enjoy lifestyle amenities designed to provide every homeowners modern comfort, a stone’s throw away from schools, churches, hospitals and commercial centers. This is The Estate Makati, experience the warmth and beauty of modern asian living
 

 The Estate Makati consist of two bedroom units, three bedroom units and four bedroom units will be an integrated mixed-use development.

title: 3 Bedroom For Sale The Proscenium Residence, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project:

Situated within the prestigious Rockwell Center, The Proscenium Residences offers a sophisticated urban lifestyle. Its strategic location provides residents with seamless access to Makati's central business district, Bonifacio Global City, and major thoroughfares like EDSA and C5. The development is also conveniently connected to the Power Plant Mall via a pedestrian bridge, enhancing its accessibility to shopping, dining, and entertainment options .




Key Building Features:

Architectural Design: Crafted by Carlos Ott, known for the Opéra Bastille in Paris, the towers feature modern aesthetics with full-height windows and elegant finishes. 




Unit Configurations: 

Units range from studios (29–30 sqm) to expansive three-bedroom units (up to 268 sqm), catering to diverse lifestyle needs .




Premium Finishes: 

Interiors boast SMEG appliances, natural stone countertops, and soft-close built-in cabinets, ensuring a blend of style and functionality .




Safety and Convenience:

Features include high-speed elevators, 100% backup power, advanced fire detection systems, and electronic access controls .




Facilities & Services

Performing Arts Theater: 

A 600-seat venue designed to host world-class cultural performances, enhancing the community's artistic ambiance .

prosceniumatrockwellmakati.wordpress.com




Amenity Deck:

Spanning nearly a hectare, it includes:

-Main, adult, and kiddie pools

-Grand lawn and manicured gardens

-Outdoor tennis court and jogging paths

-Cabanas and gazebos for relaxation 




Indoor Amenities:

-Fully equipped fitness center

-Function rooms for events

-Business center with meeting rooms

-Libraries and game rooms

-Daycare centers for children .

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale One Roxas Triangle, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project:

One Roxas Triangle is a 51-story luxury residential condominium located in the heart of Makati City’s central business district, developed by Ayala Land and Hongkong Land, designed by the internationally renowned architectural firm Skidmore, Owings & Merrill to offer exclusive, low-density living with spacious units, top-tier amenities, and panoramic views, setting a benchmark for high-end urban living in the Philippines.







Key Building Features Architectural Design:

One Roxas Triangle is a 51-storey luxury residential tower in Makati City, designed by the world-renowned firm Skidmore, Owings & Merrill LLP, featuring a distinctive triangular layout that maximizes natural light, ventilation, and panoramic city views, while offering low-density living with only one to four spacious units per floor, supported by full backup power, high-speed elevators, 24/7 security, and top-tier amenities such as a swimming pool, fitness center, function rooms, landscaped gardens, and a helipad combining structural integrity, elegance, and privacy in one of Metro Manila’s most prestigious addresses.







Unit Configurations: 

One Roxas Triangle offers spacious, well-appointed residential units with configurations typically ranging from three bedroom to four bedroom layouts, with floor areas starting at approximately 280 square meters, designed to occupy only one to four units per floor to ensure maximum privacy, comfort, and exclusivity for residents.




Modern Finishes: 

Each unit at One Roxas Triangle features modern finishes, including premium-grade materials such as hardwood flooring, natural stone countertops, sleek cabinetry, imported tiles, and high-quality fixtures, all thoughtfully designed to reflect contemporary luxury and timeless elegance.




Facilities & Services

- Swimming pool

- Fitness center/gym

- Landscaped gardens

- Helipad

- Basement parking

- 24/7 security and CCTV monitoring

- Property management and maintenance

- Backup power

- Fire detection and alarm system

- Waste management

Kirov at The Proscenium Residences




Overview of the Project

Kirov Tower at The Proscenium in Makati City is a 56-storey luxury residential tower by Rockwell Land, designed by renowned architect Carlos Ott, offering spacious three- to four-bedroom units with elegant European-inspired interiors, world-class amenities, and low-density floor layouts for a refined and exclusive living experience.







Key Building Features

Architectural Design: Kirov Tower features a sleek, modern architectural design by world-renowned architect Carlos Ott, characterized by its towering glass façade, low-density floor layout with only 2–4 units per level, high ceilings, expansive balconies, and European-inspired interiors that reflect elegance, symmetry, and timeless sophistication.




Unit Configurations: Kirov Unit primarily composed of 3-bedroom residences ranging from approximately 224 to 241 square meters, as well as exclusive 3- and 4-bedroom penthouse units with sizes reaching up to 332 square meters each thoughtfully designed with spacious living areas, en-suite bedrooms, maid’s quarters, and private balconies for a luxurious high-rise lifestyle.

title: 2 Bedroom For Sale in Cityland Calle Estacion, Makati City
description:
Cityland Calle Estacion




Overview of the Project

Cityland Calle Estacion offers a strategically located, affordable Makati living option with essential amenities, flexible unit types, and rental potential. Ideal for young professionals or small families—though maintenance quirks and pest concerns may come with the lower price point.




Key Building Features


  38-Storey Mixed-Use Tower with residential, commercial, and office spaces.

  Unit Options: Studio to 3-bedroom units (approx. 25–98 sqm).

  Amenities: Swimming pool, gym, spa, sauna, roof garden, viewing deck, jogging path, playground, and function rooms.

  Safety & Utilities: 24/7 security, CCTV, high-speed elevators, backup power, fire exits, mailroom, and concierge.

  Parking: Multi-level basement parking.

title: 2 Bedroom For Lease in Lincoln Tower, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project

Lincoln Tower is a high-rise residential development located in the heart of Makati City, offering modern urban living near major business and lifestyle centers. It features studio to two-bedroom units, premium amenities such as a pool, gym, and sky lounge, and caters to professionals, investors, and urban dwellers. With its prime location, quality design, and strong rental potential, it presents an attractive investment opportunity in one of Metro Manila’s top real estate markets.




Key Building Features

Lincoln Tower is a 47-storey luxury residential building in Rockwell Center, Makati. Developed by Rockwell Land and designed by Carlos Ott, it features premium studio to two-bedroom units, top-notch amenities (pools, gym, lounges), 24/7 security, and full backup power. With direct access to Power Plant Mall and major business hubs, it offers modern, convenient, and upscale urban living.




Unit Configurations: 

offers studio (29–30 sqm), one-bedroom (60–72 sqm), and two-bedroom (89–121 sqm) units. All feature high ceilings, large windows, and premium finishes—ideal for singles, couples, and small families seeking upscale city living.




Premium Finishes: 

eature high ceilings, large windows, quality flooring, modern kitchens with premium countertops, stylish bathrooms, inverter air-conditioning, and built-in closets—delivering a refined, upscale living experience.




Safety and Convenience: 

offers 24/7 security, fire safety systems, backup power, high-speed elevators, basement parking, and direct access to Power Plant Mall—ensuring a safe and convenient lifestyle.




Facilities & Services

features pools, gardens, a gym, function rooms, retail shops, a theater, and a sky lounge, supported by professional property management and concierge services for a well-rounded lifestyle.

description:
Overview of the Project 

One Rockwell West is a premium residential condominium developed by Rockwell Land Corporation, located in the heart of Rockwell Center, Makati. As part of the iconic One Rockwell complex, the West Tower is known for its distinctive architecture, spacious units, and luxurious amenities.




Key Building Features:

One Rockwell West features a striking 40-storey design by Arquitectonica, offering spacious units with floor-to-ceiling windows, double-height lofts, high-speed elevators, 24/7 security, backup power, and direct access to Power Plant Mall—all set within a green, sustainably designed building that provides panoramic views of the city.







Unit Configurations: One Rockwell West offers a variety of unit configurations, including studio (27–28 sqm), one-bedroom flats and lofts (51–71 sqm), two-bedroom flats and lofts (70–125 sqm), bi-level two-bedroom units (132–135 sqm), and three-bedroom flats (127 sqm), many featuring double-height ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows.




Modern Finishes:Each unit at One Rockwell West features modern finishes such as sleek laminate or hardwood flooring, contemporary cabinetry, quartz countertops, premium bathroom fixtures, and floor-to-ceiling windows creating a refined, upscale ambiance throughout.

title: 3 Bedroom For Sale in One Roxas Triangle, Makati City
description:
Overview of the Project

One Roxas Triangle is a prestigious 51-storey residential condominium in Makati’s Central Business District, completed in 2000–2001. Developed by Ayala Land in partnership with Hongkong Land and BPI, and designed by the renowned Skidmore, Owings & Merrill with Pimentel Rodriguez Simbulan & Partners, it stands at 174.3 m high




Key Building Features

One Roxas Triangle is a premier residential tower in Makati, known for its exclusivity, luxury finishes, and prime location. Designed by top international architects, it features private elevator lobbies, spacious units with floor-to-ceiling windows, and high-end materials like Poggenpohl kitchens and Brazilian cherry wood flooring. The building offers resort-style amenities, including a lagoon pool, gym, tennis and squash courts, and 24/7 concierge and security—making it one of Makati’s most prestigious addresses.




Unit Configurations:

One Roxas Triangle offers spacious, high-end residences focused on privacy and luxury. Most units are three-bedroom layouts ranging from 300 to 330 sqm, featuring en-suite baths, maid’s quarters, and multiple parking slots. Exclusive penthouse and bi-level units reach up to 550 sqm.




Premium Finishes: 

features premium finishes such as Poggenpohl kitchens with GE appliances, granite countertops, Brazilian cherry wood flooring, and high-end bathroom fixtures—delivering a refined and luxurious living experience.




Safety and Convenience: 

ensures resident safety and comfort with 24/7 security, CCTV monitoring, and controlled access systems. Each unit has a private elevator lobby, enhancing privacy and security. The building also features backup power, efficient fire protection systems, and professional concierge services for everyday convenience.




Facilities & Services

offers top-tier amenities, including a lagoon-style pool, gym, tennis and squash courts, spa, children’s playroom, and function rooms. Residents also enjoy 24/7 concierge service, professional security, private elevators, and a retail podium—ensuring comfort, safety, and convenience in daily living.

a premium mid-rise residential tower in Rockwell Center, Makati, known for its elegant Asian-inspired design and upscale living experience. title: 3 Bedroom For Sale in Salcedo Park, Makati City
description:
Salcedo Park




Overview of the Project:

Salcedo Park, located in Makati's Salcedo Village, is a serene urban oasis featuring lush greenery, a children's playground, walking paths, and water features, and is home to the popular Salcedo Market, a weekend market offering fresh produce, gourmet food, and local crafts.







Key Building Features

Architectural Design: Salcedo Park Architectural design combines minimalist modernism with eco-friendly features, featuring smooth concrete walkways, contemporary seating, integrated water elements, and lush landscaping, all while maintaining accessibility and blending harmoniously with the surrounding urban landscape.







Unit Configurations: Salcedo Park itself does not have unit configurations as it is a public green space, but the surrounding residential buildings in Salcedo Village typically offer studio units (25–35 sqm), one-bedroom units (40–60 sqm), two-bedroom units (70–100 sqm), and larger luxury penthouses, catering to a variety of living preferences.




Modern Finishes: The unit feature modern finishes such as sleek tiled flooring, granite countertops, built-in cabinetry, and contemporary bathroom fixtures that reflect upscale urban living.

description:
Trion Towers 2




Overview of the Project




Trion Towers 2 is a residential condominium tower and part of a larger mixed-use development in the BGC area. It will be a part of the Trion Towers project, which has already gained attention for its luxury residential and commercial spaces.







Key Building Features

Architectural Design: Composed of three 49‑storey towers arranged in a triangular (tri‑axial) formation on a 1‑hectare site. This configuration ensures structural stability, maximizes views, daylight, and natural cross‑ventilation, while enhancing unit privacy.




Unit Configurations: Trion Towers 2 offers unit type is designed with functionality, comfort, and natural ventilation in mind, aligned with the tower’s tri-axial architectural layout. The configurations emphasize efficient space usage and urban comfort while integrating access to premium amenities and skyline views.

description:
The Proscenium Residences Overview of the Project
 Situated within the prestigious Rockwell Center, The Proscenium Residences offers a sophisticated urban lifestyle. Its strategic location provides residents with seamless access to Makati's central business district, Bonifacio Global City, and major thoroughfares like EDSA and C5. The development is also conveniently connected to the Power Plant Mall via a pedestrian bridge, enhancing its accessibility to shopping, dining, and entertainment options .

Description: Bare 3-Bedroom High-Floor Unit with Maid’s Room For Sale at The Proscenium Residences, Rockwell

Live in one of Makati’s most prestigious addresses with this bare 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom unit at The Proscenium Residences by Rockwell, located on a high floor and offering unobstructed views of the Rockwell Center skyline.

Spanning a well-laid-out floor plan, this unit offers a blank canvas to design your dream home. The spacious living and dining areas are framed by large windows that bring in natural light and showcase sweeping city views. Each bedroom features generous space and privacy, with 3 full bathrooms and an additional maid’s room with its own toilet and bath, ideal for families or professionals seeking both luxury and function.

Enjoy exclusive access to world-class amenities including a lap pool, gym, function rooms, children’s play areas, and 24/7 security. Located in the heart of Rockwell, you’re just steps away from Power Plant Mall, cafés, fine dining, and premier business addresses.

The open-plan living and dining areas create an ideal space for entertaining, complemented by a modern kitchen with high-end appliances and sleek cabinetry. The master suite includes a walk-in closet and a luxurious bath with double vanity, and separate shower.

Additional features include a utility area with maid’s quarters and bath, centralized air-conditioning, and tandem parking slots.

Park Terraces offers premier amenities such as a fully equipped gym, swimming pool, function rooms, landscaped gardens, and direct access to Glorietta and the Ayala Center through a dedicated basement walkway.

1BR Condo for Sale in Knightsbridge Residences Makati







Own a beautifully designed 1-bedroom unit at Knightsbridge Residences, one of Makati’s most iconic towers in Century City.




Property Code: FS962

Project / Tower: KNIGHTSBRIDGE RESIDENCES

- With 2 bathrooms

- Interior decorated and furnished

- With unobstructed city views

- With 1 Parking Slot

- With keycard access for extra security




Sale price: ₱ 10,800,000.00







Knightsbridge Residences at Century City, Makati

Inspired by the prestigious Knightsbridge district in London—home to international celebrities and icons—Knightsbridge Residences brings British sophistication and modern luxury to the heart of Makati.




As the second tower to rise in Century City, this iconic residential skyscraper is surrounded by architectural landmarks such as Gramercy Residences, Milano Residences, Trump Tower, and Century Spire by Daniel Libeskind and Armani/Casa.




Located in Barangay Poblacion, Makati’s most historic and culturally rich neighborhood, Knightsbridge offers direct access to Century City Mall and a vibrant mix of cafes, restaurants, art hubs, nightlife, and shopping.




Knightsbridge Residences delivers a lifestyle that blends elegance, convenience, and the vibrant energy of urban living—perfect for investors and homeowners seeking a prime Makati address.







Amenities:

- Infinity Pool & Kids’ Pool

- Fitness Center with Yoga/Dance Studio

- Private Theater

- Game Room & Arcade

- Library / Reading Room

- Dining Room (for private functions)

- Sky Deck & Observatory with panoramic city views

- Spa, Sauna, & Steam Room

- Business Center / Meeting Rooms

- High-speed Elevators

- 24/7 Security + Keycard Access

- Basement Parking & Concierge Service




Nearby Establishments:

- Century City Mall

- SM Jazz Mall

- Power Plant Mall

- Greenbelt & Glorietta

- Mapúa University Makati

- Asian Institute of Management (AIM)

- Art spaces, co-working spots, and boutique stores

The Manansala by Rockwell Land offers an exceptional blend of quality, affordability, and luxury for discerning homeowners and investors. This 41-storey condominium tower stands as an impressive residential option within the prestigious Rockwell Center in Makati, Metro Manila. Designed to cater to a diverse range of residents, The Manansala features various units to meet the needs of young professionals, couples, and families. The development combines elegance and practicality, making it an ideal choice for modern city living.




The Manansala features and amenities
The Manansala provides a host of amenities that support a comfortable, vibrant, and upscale lifestyle:


  Indoor Amenities: Function rooms for meetings, events, and social gatherings.

  Outdoor Amenities: A selection of pools, including an adult swimming pool, lap pool, and kiddie pool, perfect for relaxation and leisure. The property also features a lush garden that serves as a tranquil retreat from the city's hustle and bustle.

  Security Features: The development boasts a comprehensive 24-hour security system, ensuring the safety and peace of mind of its residents.

One Rockwell is an iconic residential condominium development situated in the eastern section of Rockwell Center, Makati City. Launched in 2005 by Rockwell Land Corporation, this project encompasses two high-rise towers known for their innovative and luxurious design. The west tower, standing 55 stories high

One Rockwell Features and Amenities
One Rockwell is equipped with state-of-the-art features and amenities that cater to the urban lifestyle of its residents:

Indoor Amenities:


  Private Gym

  Game Room

  Theatre Room

  Function Rooms

  Underground Private Access to Power Plant Mall

title: For Sale 2 Bedroom One Rockwell West
description:
For Sale One Rockwell West

2 Bedroom loft 

 2 Bathroom 

106sqm 

Furnished 

2 parking 

Selling Price: Php 35,000.000




One Rockwell West Tower is a residential condominium located in Rockwell Center, Makati, Philippines. It is one of two towers in the One Rockwell complex, with the West Tower being the taller of the two. The building is known for its distinctive curvilinear design, with two halves that appear to slide away from each other. It stands 55 stories high and is one of the tallest skyscrapers in the Philippines.




The tower is elliptical in shape and is built using the usual steel and glaze. Balconies are built at the peak of the tower. The bulk of the tower is covered in a blue tinted glaze but clear glazing covers the roof.

The facade overrun allows the using of a rooftop pool and a decking area. The top of the tower also features two levels.




One Rockwell Features and Amenities
One Rockwell is equipped with state-of-the-art features and amenities that cater to the urban lifestyle of its residents:

Garden Towers

 ABOUT GARDEN TOWERS
 Ayala Land Premier, with its unrivaled heritage unveils another brilliant living experience to the glittering Makati skyline. Garden Towers is a prime residential enclave in the newly master-planned Ayala Center redevelopment. Its Ayala Center address provides residents with conveniences and luxuries within arm's reach.
 
 Garden Towers, a two tower residential development is on East Street, Ayala Center and first hexagonal shaped building by Ayala Land for a residential project.
 
 Garden Towers a first for residential condos which are very flexible sunrooms in most units.
 

 LOCATION
 Very prime location where in it is situated in a strip of 5 star hotels and a newly renovated high end mall Glorietta 1 and 2.
 

 SPECIAL FEATURES
 Ayala Land Premier presents a relaxing transition from urban to green with Garden Towers’s special features.
 

 AMENITIES
  Gardens
 Pool with shower/locker rooms
 Function rooms
 Gym with shower/locker rooms
 Mailroom/ Package room
 Concierge
 Security room
 Driver’s lounge
 Service entrance for personnel
 Property management office
 Leasing office
 Loading dock
 Garbage room and chute
 Materials recovery facility
  

 Ayala Land Premier presents a relaxing transition from urban to green with Garden Towers’s special features:
 

 Garden Lobby Drop Off
  Main entrance begins with a lush green wall drop off
 Casual seating areas evoke a veranda/lanai feel
 Indoor garden lobby with high ceilings
 Glimpse of the development’s garden amenities beyond
 Separate concierge and ground floor lobbies for each tower
  

 Garden Amenities
  Significant portion of the 9,010 sqm lot is dedicated to exclusive gardens that also house the development’s pool and social amenities
 Uninterrupted access to Glorietta via landscaped connections uniting the development to Palm Promenade
 Palm Promenade offers a sweep of green with shopping and dining options on both sides
  

 Sky Gardens
  Alternating between the East and West Corners and every two floors, the sky gardens are 20 sqm areas of natural light and generous garden spaces accessible to residents on that floor
  

 Sunroom
  Select units offer Sunrooms that can be fully enclosed
 Floor-to-ceiling windows bathe a wooden deck area in light, sky, and seamless city views
 Sliding doors open up homes to a private, all weather expanse of sky

description:
Studio for Sale in Greenbelt Chancellor Makati







Discover Greenbelt Chancellor – a cozy studio unit in the heart of Makati’s Legazpi Village! Semi-furnished and perfect for young professionals or investors. Clean title and ready to move in.

Sale price: ₱5,880,000.00 (Gross)

Payment terms: Cash or bank financing










Greenbelt Chancellor, developed by Megaworld Corporation, is a distinguished residential tower situated in the heart of Makati City’s bustling Central Business District. Located along Castro Street in Legazpi Village, it offers residents convenient access to major establishments and premier shopping destinations, including the iconic Greenbelt Mall. Completed in 2011, this 35-story condominium exemplifies urban sophistication and modern luxury.




The building features a comprehensive range of upscale amenities designed to enhance the urban living experience. Indoor facilities include a 12-meter lap pool with a pool lounge, a fully equipped gym, and separate male and female shower and locker rooms. Security is prioritized with a 24-hour security system, CCTV monitoring, and three high-speed elevators. Outdoor amenities include a well-maintained playground and a driver paging system, providing added convenience for residents. Greenbelt Chancellor is also pet-friendly, accommodating small pets to suit diverse lifestyles. Centralized mail rooms further contribute to the convenience and comfort of its residents.

description: This stunning abode is located at the crossroads of Makati Avenue, Gil Puyat Avenue, and Paseo de Roxas, with an expansive view of the Makati Central Business District.
